data.title: Tech Review - Side Protocol
data.description:
**Tech Review:** [https://docs.google.com/document/d/169pPMZOav6LEw5TYofpIWeH_OIxrEnrHaoa_Vz1ZZgc/edit?tab=t.0](https://docs.google.com/document/d/169pPMZOav6LEw5TYofpIWeH_OIxrEnrHaoa_Vz1ZZgc/edit?tab=t.0)

**Tech Score: 85.45%**

**Notes:**

* **SmartContract Support:** Side Chain utilizes a Wasm VM, written in Rust, to execute smart contracts.


* Build on top of Cosmos SDK 
* **CometBFT**, a high-performance consensus engine
* Side Chain utilizes BTC as its native gas token.
* sBTC is a native token on the Side Chain, fully pegged 1:1 to BTC held on the Bitcoin mainnet
* **Side Hub:** Side Hub is your one-stop destination for accessing a wide range of innovative applications built on Bitcoin and Side Chain
* **Side Station: A Bitcoin plus side chain asset explorer ( **[**https://station-test.side.one/explorer**](https://station-test.side.one/explorer)**) that shows the blocks, transactions, and address, It also supports Side Chain staking, governance, and a faucet for testnet users. It also Visualize data from Side Bridge, including addresses, currencies, amounts, Bitcoin transactions,**
* **Side Wallet**: Self-custody Bitcoin and Side Chain wallet

data.title: Ticket 2: Update Signature Verification Logic
data.description:
**Title:** Update Signature Verification to Handle Extended Payment Message

**Description:**
Modify the signature verification logic so that it validates and returns the extended PaymentMessage, including the new referral fields.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* The SignatureVerifier returns a PaymentMessage that includes `referrer` and `referralFeePercentage`.
* Unit tests verify that both legacy and extended messages are handled correctly.
* Proper error handling is implemented for invalid or missing referral data.

**Dependencies:**

* Completion of Ticket 1.

data.title: Ticket 1: Extend Payment Message Structure
data.description:
**Title:** Extend PaymentMessage to Include Referral Data

**Description:**
Update the backend-signed payment message structure to include the following new fields:

* `address referrer` – The address of the referrer.
* `uint256 referralFeePercentage` – The referral fee percentage (in basis points) to be applied to the payment amount.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* The `PaymentMessage` struct (in the SignatureVerifier contract or related module) includes the new referral fields.
* All references and parsing logic are updated to handle the new fields.
* Unit tests confirm that messages with and without referral data are parsed correctly.

**Dependencies:**

* Coordination with the backend team to ensure the new fields are signed.

comments.body: [https://github.com/token-metrics/tmai-solidity-contracts/blob/payment/src/utils/SignatureVerifier.sol](https://github.com/token-metrics/tmai-solidity-contracts/blob/payment/src/utils/SignatureVerifier.sol)

data.title: fundamental review 18 - Paradex Network
data.description:
Paradex Network - 71.43%

Scorecard: [Paradex Network - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1j4hFCuxVN_TrfopiwkiGWafMH-THaPqgaLe2__yaZRA/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* Paradex is a crypto derivatives exchange built on a StarkNet appchain, designed to optimize user experience with deep liquidity, low fees, and fast performance.
* High-Performance Decentralized Exchange Engineered for Open Finance.
* Ecosystem features a battle-tested DEX, next gen asset management vaults, lending pools and more.
* Powered by Starknet and Pyth
* Live on mainnet 
* The Public Testnet for Paradex Chain is now live. Built on the SN Stack, Paradex Chain is a general-purpose smart contract platform powered by CairoVM.

## Solution:

* It focuses on self-custodial, on-chain risk management for derivatives trading, addressing gaps in market trust, and risk assessment in the crypto exchange landscape. 
* Paradex is an advanced Perpetuals DEX built on a high-performance Layer 2 network, engineered for Open Finance.

## Innovation:

* 

## Use Case / Features:

* Paradex currently offers perpetual futures trading and aims to expand its asset offerings.

## Traction:

## Tokenomics:

* Xperience Points (XP) are the new universal metric to measure and reward user engagement on Paradex.
  * Trading and pay trading fees
  * Provide liquidity (spread, depth, uptime, maker volume)
  * Maintaining open trading positions
  * Depositing collateral as trading margin or into Paradex Vaults
  * Getting liquidated
  * Trading frequently, referring friends, using new products and features, publishing community research, sharing alpha and being active in Discord
* The total token supply will be distributed as follows with 57.6% allocated to the community
  * 20.0% for Community Airdrop
  * 26.6% for Ongoing Community Rewards (post Airdrop)
  * 5.0% for Liquidity Programs
  * 6.0% for Foundation Budget
  * 25.1% for Core Contributors
  * 3.8% for Future Core Contributors and Advisors
  * 13.5% for Paradigm shareholders
* $DIME

## Roadmap:

Jan-Jul 2025

**Expand Product Offering** 

* Perpetual Options - A new way to gamble
* Spot Trading + Multi-collateral (any crypto as collateral)
* XUSD (yield-bearing synthetic dollar)
* Intent-based RFQ trading (via app.paradigm.trade)
* Isolated Margin
* AI-Agents that manage Paradex Vaults

**User Experience & Privacy**

* Social logins with Privy
* Multi-strategy vaults (e.g., Covered Call Vaults)

**Paradex Chain**

* Launching Paradex Chain & opening it to external developers
* zk-based position privacy (via client side proving)

**Full Decentralization**

* Moving from Stage 0 to Stage 1 Rollup (L2beat framework)
* Delegating governance to the community
* Open-sourcing the entire stack

**Infrastructure: Bridging & Oracles**

* Interop with Hyperlane
* Fast withdrawals
* Internal Spot Oracle for instant asset listings

## Business Model:

* The Taker pays 6bps of underlying notional as a taker fee.
* The Maker receives 1bp of underlying notional as the maker rebate.

## Go-To-Market:

* 

## Investors:

* Paradex is incubated by **Paradigm - 3**
* Jump Capital - 1
* **Dragonfly Capital - 3**
* **Digital Currency Group (DCG) - 7**
* Optiver
* **QCP Capital - 8**
* Nexo - 0
* Imc
* **GSR - 8**
* Akuna Capital 
* Vectr
* Amber - 0
* CMT Digital - 1
* Avon Ventures

## Community:

* 23.3k on X
* 28k on Discord 
* 693 on Telegram 

## Competition: 

* 

## Team: 

*

data.title: fundamental review 17 - Multipli
data.description:
Multipli - 68.10%

Scorecard: [Multipli - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rgacIFX_gwNcUAEuoeMgFGaB6sUBEopT5PVxXb-QDYQ/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* Democratising Yield on Native, Stable and Real World Tokenised Assets.
* Private Mainnet Live
* TVL $52.9M
* Yield $7.5M
* Multipli leverages delta-neutral arbitrage strategies in spot and futures markets to offer high yields on native tokens and real-world tokenised assets (RWA).
* Currently, Multipli supports USDT, USDC, BTC, ETH and SOL.

## Solution:

* Multipli is a cross-chain secure yield farming platform designed to democratize access to reliable and lucrative yields on tokenized assets, including native cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Binance Coin (BNB). By tapping into the trillion-dollar crypto asset market, Multipli enables users to earn sustainable yields of up to 35% APY on various assets.

## Innovation:

* The platform operates by leveraging real-world asset (RWA) tokenization, bringing tangible assets on-chain to unlock yield opportunities for traditionally non-yield-bearing assets such as stocks and commodities.
* Multipli's approach includes integrating treasury-backed tokens and utilizing strategies like contango and funding rate mechanisms to generate consistent returns for users.
* Key components of the platform encompass user-friendly staking processes, cross-chain compatibility, and a focus on security to ensure a seamless and trustworthy experience for participants.

## Use Case / Features:

* 

## Traction:

* **500,000+ Users Onboarded:** Multipli has rapidly grown its community, welcoming half a million users with an impressive 160,000 daily active users engaging with our platform.
* **Average APY of 31.28%:** Users have enjoyed exceptional average annual percentage yields on our private mainnet, showcasing the effectiveness of our yield strategies.
* **$50 Million Total Value Locked (TVL):** Achieving this significant TVL reflects the strong trust and confidence our users have placed in Multipli.
* **130 Million tORBs Distributed:** We have generously rewarded our early adopters and contributors with 130 million tORBs, underscoring our commitment to our community.
* **Winner of Binance BIA 4th Edition:** Multipli was honored to win the 4th edition of the Binance BIA.

## Tokenomics:

* 

## Roadmap:

**Genesis Testnet Phase (Before Mainnet Launch)**

* **Purpose:** To test and refine our platform with the community's help.
* Weightage: 70% of total tORBs allocation.
* **Duration:** 2 months or 1M users, whichever comes first
* **Highlights:**
  * Users engaged with the platform, providing invaluable feedback.
  * Early adopters earned tORBs, our testnet tokens representing contributions.

**Arc Testnet Phase (After Mainnet Launch)**

* **Purpose:** To continue refining features and ensuring robustness post-launch.
* **Weightage:** 30% of total tORBs allocation.
* **Duration:** 6 months or TGE, whichever comes first
* **Highlights:**
  * Additional testing with real-world variables.
  * Further tORBs distribution to active participants.
* Note: All tORBs accumulated during these phases will be converted to ORBs at a specific ratio during the Token Generation Event (TGE).

**Season 1: Genesis**

* **Objective:** Achieve the first $100 million in Total Value Locked (TVL).
* **Weightage:** 50% of ORBs allocation.
* **Duration:** 3 months or until the $100M TVL milestone is reached, whichever comes first.
* **User Benefits:**
  * **Yield Earnings:** Earn baseline yield between 15-25% on stablecoins and 8-12% on native tokens like BTC and ETH.
  * **Boosted Yield:** Earn boosted yield from our partners.
  * **xToken Distribution:** Receive xTokens in a 1:1 ratio for every token staked (e.g., stake 100 USDC, receive 100 xUSDC).
  * **ORBs Accumulation:** Earn 10 ORBs for every day you hold $100 worth of xTokens.

**Season 2: Growth**

* **Objective:** Reach the next $300 million in TVL.
* **Weightage:** 30% of ORBs allocation.
* **User Benefits:**
  * Continued yield earnings, though rates may adjust slightly as the platform scales.
  * Ongoing xToken rewards and ORBs accumulation.
  * Opportunity to leverage network effects through referrals.

**Season 3: Moon**

* **Objective:** Achieve the final $200 million in TVL, culminating in a total of $500 million.
* **Weightage:** 20% of ORBs allocation.
* **User Benefits:**
  * Stable yield generation with a matured protocol.
  * Final chances to accumulate ORBs before TGE.
  * Solidify your position in the Multipli ecosystem.

**Post-TGE Seasons**

After the TGE, the adventure doesn't stop! We will have four seasons every year, during which ORBs will be emitted at a rate proportional to the protocol's revenue.

* **Sustainable Growth:** As the protocol generates revenue, a portion will be redistributed to ORB holders.
* **Continuous Engagement:** Regular seasons ensure ongoing opportunities for users to engage and earn.
* **Community-Centric Development:** Future developments and improvements will be guided by ORB holders through governance.

## Business Model:

* 

## Go-To-Market:

## Investors:

* **Pantera - 4**
* Elevation - 0
* Spartan - 1
* **Starkware - 2**
* Goodwater - 0
* **Protofund Venture Catalysts - 3**

## Community:

* 24k on X
* 1.4k on Discord 

## Competition: 

* 

## Team: 

*

data.title: fundamental review 16 - Kalypso
data.description:
Kalypso - 62.38%

Scorecard: [Kalypso - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1_uSWzYqbwej_TIBas604b-yo9d6Dzny2d_3L4bMGaFg/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* The first community-powered ZK prover network.
* Built on Marlin

## Solution:

* An open network to compute zero-knowledge proofs
* **Trustless matching engine:** Orderbook-based exchange architecture to connect specialized hardware operators with ZK-powered application users.
* Kalypso is a **circuit-agnostic ZK proof marketplace**.
* It connects users who wish to delegate the generation of ZK proofs to specialized hardware operators who wish to increase resource efficiency.
* A competitive market motivates hardware providers to innovate, reduce costs and increase the speed of proof generation.
* They may achieve this by securing access to specialized hardware (FPGA, ASICs), fine-tuning their software, securing affordable energy and cheap colocation facilities.

## Innovation:

* **Hardware Operators: Compute proofs & earn rewards**
  * **Former miner, gamer, or perhaps a data uses zk center operator with spare GPUs and access to cheap electricity? Monetize your resources by generating zk proofs for rollups, bridges, dexes, games, DIDs or generalized VMs.**
* **Software Developers: Improve UX by delegating proofs**
  * **Developing an app or service that proofs but not interested in spending countless hours on devops? Integrate our SDK to automatically route proof generation requests from clients to the permissionless Kalypso prover network.**

The Kalypso network may consist of different kinds of hardware:

* Servers (like Amazon EC2)
* Servers with confidential computing support (like Intel SGX/TDX, AWS Nitro Enclaves)
* GPUs (like RX 7600s)
* GPUs with confidential computing support (like NVIDIA H100s)

## Use Case / Features:

* **Plug-and-play:** Modular architecture with seamless integration options, extensible through various zkVMs.
* **Flexible:** Ability to prioritize cost or speed anytime with the option to join or leave markets as a user or hardware operator.
* **Open:** Arbitrary circuits and proving schemes with no lock-in along with a choice of local, hosted or open market solutions.

Why decentralize proving?

* **Liveness:** Improve reliability guarantees and probability of timely proof generation through greater redundancy and strict penalties for failures.
* **Efficiency:** Increase resource utilization and reduce idle time of hardware by serving multiple apps, hence amortizing fixed cost and saving BD and setup time.
* **Censorship-resistance:** Prevent apps from being vulnerable to the whims of provers who refuse to generate proofs for transactions that are against their interests

## Traction:

data.title: fundamental review 15 - Coral Finance
data.description:
Coral Finance - 66.67%

Scorecard: [Coral Finance - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KlAm_S1HPNf-kO4f5IdJv8cckcgvQU1vKHTfz6ETRMI/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* The premier expectation marketplace and liquidity hub for pre-market assets.
* A new way to release liquidity and trade for pre-market assets with efficiency, flexibility and reliability.

## Solution:

* Coral Finance is a marketplace and liquidity hub for pre-market assets, where users can easily discover hidden gems and blue chips.
* Coral constructs a pre-listing market with substantial growth in size, filling the gap before the Token Generation Event (TGE).
* Coral’s vision is to build a hub where everyone can create liquidity for pre-market assets in any format and aggregate the trades.
  * Minimizing liquidity acquisition costs for protocols
  * Offering the best prices
  * Mitigating credit risks associated with OTC transactions
  * Capturing user attention and allowing users to track and find high-quality, and promising pre-listing assets

## Innovation:

* **1st to Market:** Locked to Unlock (L.t.U) mechanism maintains the value of assets and offers solidified liquidity. Allow users to lock in profits before TGE.
* **Diverse Scenarios For Points:** Besides trading, you can also use points for LP Rental, Staking, Boosting and more.
* **Fair Trade:** No collaterals needed. No waiting time. Users avoid being farmed. Trade like a pro with smooth experience.
* **Flywheel Effect:** Offer great benefits to both protocols and users in many aspects.

## Use Case / Features:

* **Step 1:** Receive pre-market assets on Coral Finance and claim converted corTokens.
* **Step 2: Automatically unlock corTokens at Base rate. Trade them on Coral DEX whenever you want.**
* **Step 3:** Boost the unlocking rate by staking liquidity. You are free to withdraw at any time.
* **Step 4:** Your remaining corTokens, including those you buy from DEX directly, will be converted to airdrop tokens after TGE. 

## Traction:

* 16,571 Trading Users
* $5,501,461.65 Trading Volume

## Tokenomics:

* Live airdrop campaign 
* Token symbol: $CORL
* Total supply: 500,000,000
* Blockchain:  BNB Chain

Utility:

* **Governance:** CORL token holders can participate and vote on governance decisions.
* **Liquidity Incentives:** Users can earn CORL tokens as rewards by providing liquidity in assigned corToken pools.
* **Boosting:** Users can earn additional CORL by locking CORL tokens. To earn CORL in this way incorporates voting escrow CORL (veCORL) for rewards accrual. This feature will launch soon.
* **Medium of Transaction:** It provides a convenient mode of payment and settlement between lenders and renters for Acceleration; or the quote token of a trading pair for corTokens. More will be revealed.

## Roadmap:

**Q2  2024, Bud**

* Social media preparation
* Initial community building
* Coralantis point system
  * PC version
  * mobile version
* Complete Beta product
* Airdrop function

**Q3 2024, Genesis**

* Launch on EVM compatible network and list project (1)
* Add multi-language support
* Complete audit (1)
* LP incentive initiation with $CORL
* Roll out non-staking point-earning scheme with blind box

**Q4 2024 - Q1 2025, C.O.R.L**

* Close second-round investment
* Deployment on more networks
  * Movement testnet
  * Movement mainnet
* List and trade Reef Point (Coral's points)
* Achieve $5M trading volume
* Launch AlphaVault for scoutting

## Business Model:

* CorSwap applies a 0.25% fee to trades, which is given back to liquidity providers. In the future, this fee and the distribution might be adjusted.
* LPs earn rewards from transaction fees, which are distributed pro-rata according to their share of the pool. Additionally, Coral Finance offers $CORL as rewards for LPs.
* A small fee (1%) is charged when corTokens are unlocked to support the treasury and contributors to Coral.

## Go-To-Market:

## Investors:

* $1.5M in May 2023 from Zebec Labs - 
* $500k in August 2023 from Momentum Capital - 0
* $3M Angel round in March 2025 from
  * Mask Network - 1
  * **KuCoin Ventures - 3**
  * Formless Capital - 1
  * Gate Ventures - 1
  * **Web3Port - 9**
  * Taisu Ventures - 1

* 193k on X

## Introduction:

* The Credit Hub for Restaking.

## Solution:

* Loop is a money market utilizing smart collateral with automated leverage to maximize capital efficiency and returns of Restaking products.

## Innovation:

## Use Case / Features:

* **Smart Collateral:** Loop accepts high-value, yield-bearing LP tokens, like Pendle LPs, Spectra LPs, or DEX LPs as collateral. Not only do these LPs generate yield, but they also accumulate points within the project’s ecosystem.
* **5x Leverage:** With Loop, you can leverage your position up to 5x. For instance, if you were originally able to be exposed with 1 ETH, Loop allows you to borrow up to 4 ETH more, amplifying your position from 1 ETH to a full 5 ETH.
* **Auto-Leverage:** Loop automates the leverage process, continuously applying the strategy for the chosen pools to your entire leveraged position. This means your 5x position generates even more points and yields automatically.

data.title: fundamental review 12 - Aegis
data.description:
Aegis - 66.67%

Scorecard: [Aegis - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ISbbl4pkJffhZKOyvuPdmxhB_2_VOKHdyOXioGN-k3g/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* Crypto-native stablecoin that protects savings from hyperinflation.
* Bitcoin-backed stablecoin with real-time transparency, built-in yield generation, and complete independence from the fiat banking system.
* Built on Ethereum.

## Solution:

* Aegis creates YUSD, a bitcoin-backed stablecoin with real-time transparency, built-in yield generation, and complete independence from the fiat banking system.

## Innovation:

* **Funding Rate Arbitrage:** Aegis performs funding rate arbitrage through delta-neutral trades in spot and perpetual markets, effectively generating profits from funding fees. These fees, disbursed three times daily, align perpetual contract and spot prices, ultimately rewarding YUSD holders.
* **Instant Liquidity:** With Aegis, you can earn yields without the hassle of staking, lockups, or waiting periods. This means you can trade YUSD freely at any time, 24/7.
* **No Staking:** Accruing yields has never been easier. Simply hold YUSD and register your wallet in the Aegis system to start earning. There's no need to lock up your assets or participate in complex staking processes.
* **Timeless Rewards:** Aegis rewards for holding YUSD are perpetual, meaning they are always available to claim as long as earned. This ensures you can continuously benefit from your holdings over time.

## Use Case / Features:

* **Delta-Neutral Position Opening Mechanism:** Aegis employs a delta-neutral position opening mechanism using Coin-M futures, providing unparalleled stability and yield generation.
* **Unique Yield Generation Mechanism Without Staking:** Aegis introduces an innovative profit distribution mechanism that allows users to earn yields without staking, lockups, or waiting periods.
* **Peg Stabilization Mechanism:** At Aegis, we have developed a sophisticated Peg Arbitrage Mechanism to ensure the stability and value of our delta-neutral stablecoin, YUSD. This mechanism leverages the concept of price discrepancies between YUSD on different markets and its intrinsic value, providing opportunities for cross-market arbitrage.
  * Benefits of the Peg Arbitrage Mechanism
    * **Stability:** Maintaining the peg ensures that YUSD remains a reliable and stable asset for users.
    * **Transparency:** The mechanism operates transparently, allowing users to see and understand how price stability is achieved.
    * **Profitability:** Users can take advantage of arbitrage opportunities, making YUSD an attractive option for traders and investors.
  * By leveraging advanced arbitrage strategies, we ensure that YUSD remains a dependable and stable asset, providing value and security to our users.
* **Off-exchange settlement:** At Aegis, we have implemented an off-exchange settlement model to ensure that user funds are protected at all times. By partnering with premier custodians, we eliminate the risks associated with centralized exchanges while maintaining seamless transaction efficiency.
* **Real-Time Transparency: Aegis provides universal access to a comprehensive dashboard showcasing both off-chain and on-chain data for all Aegis operations.** 
* **Insurance Fund: The Aegis Insurance Fund is an integral part of the Aegis Protocol, providing a financial buffer to ensure the stability of the YUSD stablecoin. It is designed to cover any costs incurred during periods of negative funding rates, ensuring that YUSD is stable even in less favorable market conditions.**
* **Mint Security Layer: The Mint Security Layer in the Aegis Protocol is designed to ensure the integrity and security of the YUSD stablecoin minting process. This layer includes several key components:**
  * **Collateral Verification: Before minting YUSD, the system verifies that the collateral provided (USDT, DAI, or USDC) is secure and meets all necessary criteria.**
  * **Over-the-Counter (OTC) Transactions: Once the collateral is received, it is converted into Bitcoin (BTC) through trusted OTC desks. This process is designed to be efficient, with a maximum time lag of 15 minutes to minimize exposure to market volatility.**
  * **Custodial Security: The acquired BTC is securely stored with trusted third-party custodians. These custodians are selected based on their robust security protocols and reliability, ensuring that the assets are well-protected.**
  * **Smart Contract Governance: The minting process is governed by smart contracts that automate and secure the creation of YUSD. These contracts enforce rules and conditions, preventing unauthorized or erroneous transactions.**
  * **Transparency and Monitoring: The entire minting process, including collateral verification and BTC acquisition, is transparent and can be monitored in real-time through the Aegis public dashboard. This transparency ensures that all actions are accountable and visible to users.**
* **Scalability:** The BTC COINM (coin-margined) futures market is a significant and growing segment of the cryptocurrency derivatives market. As of 2024, BTC COINM Open Interest (OI) represents approximately 26% of the total perpetual futures market, with a current value of around $7 billion. Historically, this percentage has reached as high as 51%, indicating substantial market participation.
* **Liquidity:** Liquidity is a cornerstone of the Aegis YUSD stablecoin, ensuring stability and efficient market operations. The YUSD ecosystem benefits from the significant liquidity of the BTC COINM futures market, which provides a deep pool of capital to support trading activities. This liquidity is crucial for minimizing price slippage and ensuring smooth transactions, even during periods of high market volatility.

## Traction:

## Tokenomics:

* The AEG token is a cornerstone of the Aegis Protocol, essential for its governance and decision-making processes.

## Roadmap:

* 

## Business Model:

* 

## Go-To-Market:

*

* $2M Pre-Seed in February 2025 from
  * Dewhales - 0

data.title: fundamental review 11 - Kasu
data.description:
Kasu - 71.90%

Scorecard: [Kasu - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1WThElfX7Q4AHFF-9F6diHvw1SAdOI_ckjNaHGHZF6LQ/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* The most risk-optimised Private Credit RWA Yields
* Lend USDC and earn the highest quality RWA private credit yields from prestigious Accounting Firms and their clients, across Tier 1 economies
* Earn up to 25% APY
* The protocol brings together everyday DeFi Lenders (“Lenders”) with creditworthy ‘real world’ business borrowers (“End Borrowers”), all curated by industry leading loan portfolio and risk managers (“Delegates”) that are exclusive to Kasu.

## Solution:

* Kasu is a Real World Asset (RWA) business lending protocol developed through a collaboration between Faculty Group and Apxium Technologies. This project seamlessly integrates Web3 and traditional finance technologies to address the critical need for optimizing business cash flows while mitigating credit risk.
* Kasu is a Real World Asset (RWA) business lending protocol that delivers on-chain yield by bringing together DeFi lenders, institutional loan managers and real world business borrowers. Borrowers comprise high creditworthy businesses, underpinned by real world cash flows and sound credit risk structuring.

## Innovation:

* Kasu not only democratises access to real world yield opportunities that are otherwise only available to institutional investors, but our proprietary technology applies innovative risk structuring and cash flow optimisation tools to improve credit risk. Ultimately, this delivers superior risk management.
* We achieve this by partnering with Apxium Technologies Limited - a global SaaS+FinTech leader with proprietary Accounts Receivables Automation Software + Smart Global Payment Rails, delivering the most intelligent working capital financing solutions for high creditworthy businesses. This includes some of the largest accounting firms in the world, for which Apxium currently manages over $2.5B in annual invoicing.

## Use Case / Features:

* Our partnership with Apxium provides us with proprietary technology that optimises businesses’ cash flows to improve credit risk, ultimately delivering superior risk management and higher quality yields.

* **SMART INVOICING & PROPOSALS:** Automated with payment links & reminders
* **GLOBAL PAYMENT SERVICES:** Smart Payment Gateway, Direct Debit, Instalments
* **SMART FINANCING SOLUTIONS:** Automated Accounts Receivable & Payables Financing

## Traction:

## Tokenomics:

Lock $KSU to achieve tiered Loyalty Levels and avail of the following utility and rewards:

* **Priority Access:** Access exclusive Lending Strategies before they’re oversubscribed.
* **Priority Withdrawals:** Access your funds faster than Lenders who haven’t locked $KSU.
* **Protocol Fee Sharing:** Share in the success you helped Kasu create.
* **Yield Bonuses:** The higher your Loyalty Level, the higher your APY bonus.

The Kasu Token ($KSU) is a utility token that has a supply limited to one billion tokens. In order for Lenders to maximise the associated benefits, KSU must be locked for either 30, 180, 360 or 720 days in order to achieve tiered Loyalty Levels. Each KSU locking period will generate a specific amount of temporary, non-redeemable and non-transferrable rKSU tokens that will accumulate, so long as KSU remains locked.

* Lenders who are also KSU Token Lockers are entitled to Protocol Fee Sharing, paid in USDC. The higher the Lender's Loyalty Level, the more share of Protocol Fees they are entitled to.

## Business Model:

## Go-To-Market:

data.title: fundamental review 10 - Enclave
data.description:
Enclave - 64.76%

Scorecard: [Enclave - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1n3la_wDgzCrc_7DtJQXeVOTUE0VtlAfqAcyWWuXRjGw/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* A new class of computation with Encrypted Execution Environments.
* Created by Gnosis Guild

## Solution:

* Enclave is an open-source protocol for Encrypted Execution Environments (E3), enabling secure and confidential computations without exposing sensitive data.

CRISP (Coercion-Resistant Impartial Selection Protocol) is a secure protocol for digital decision-making, leveraging fully homomorphic encryption (FHE) and distributed threshold cryptography (DTC) to enable verifiable secret ballots. Built with Enclave, CRISP safeguards democratic systems and decision-making applications against coercion, manipulation, and other vulnerabilities.

## Innovation:

An Encrypted Execution Environment (E3) is a decentralized framework designed to allow secure computation over encrypted data from multiple sources. E3s ensure data privacy and computational integrity by combining three essential components:

* **Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE):** Enables computations directly on encrypted data without needing to decrypt it, maintaining security from start to finish.
* **Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKPs):** Allow verification of data and computations without revealing sensitive information, offering a way to validate accuracy while preserviing privacy.
* **Distributed Threshold Cryptography (DTC):** Distributes cryptographic keys across multiple nodes, eliminating single points of failure and enhancing the framework’s resilience against breaches.

Together, these components create a secure, verifiable framework for privacy-preserving computation.

## Use Case / Features:

Key use cases include:

* **Processing Sensitive Data:** Handle personal, financial, or otherwise confidential data without taking custody of plaintext.
* **Meeting Regulatory Requirements:** Build applications compliant with data protection laws like HIPAA or GDPR.
* **Eliminating Trust Issues:** Minimized reliance on trusted parties or specialized hardware for securing sensitive data.

Enclave achieves this by providing a framework where data remains encrypted during computation, leveraging a combination of advanced cryptographic techniques: Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE), Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKPs), and Distributed Threshold Cryptography (DTC).

Use Cases:

* **Secret Ballots:** Implement verifiable and private voting systems.
* **Secure Data Analysis:** Perform computations on private datasets without taking custody of raw data.
* **Collaborative Research:** Enable multiple organizations to securely aggregate and analyze data without mutual data sharing.

## Traction:

## Tokenomics:

The responsibilities of Enclave token holders include:

* Protocol Management
* Protocol Upgrades
* Dispute Resolution
* Parameter Settings
* Cancellation Burn Percentage
* Staking Deposit Amounts
* Registration Delay Period
* Decommission Delay Period
* Inactive Node Penalty Amounts
* Intermediate Slashing Penalty and Burn Ratio

## Roadmap:

* 

## Business Model:

* When requesting a computation from Enclave, Requesters must deposit a fee proportional to the number and threshold of Ciphernodes requested, the duration for which they are required to be available, and any additional costs required by the selected Compute Provider.

*

* **Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE):** Enables computations directly on encrypted data without needing to decrypt it, maintaining security from start to finish.
* **Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKPs):** Allow verification of data and computations without revealing sensitive information, offering a way to validate accuracy while preserviing privacy.
* **Distributed Threshold Cryptography (DTC):** Distributes cryptographic keys across multiple nodes, eliminating single points of failure and enhancing the framework’s resilience against breaches.

Together, these components create a secure, verifiable framework for privacy-preserving computation.

## Use Case / Features:

Key use cases include:

* **Processing Sensitive Data:** Handle personal, financial, or otherwise confidential data without taking custody of plaintext.
* **Meeting Regulatory Requirements:** Build applications compliant with data protection laws like HIPAA or GDPR.
* **Eliminating Trust Issues:** Minimized reliance on trusted parties or specialized hardware for securing sensitive data.

Enclave achieves this by providing a framework where data remains encrypted during computation, leveraging a combination of advanced cryptographic techniques: Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE), Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKPs), and Distributed Threshold Cryptography (DTC).

Use Cases:

* **Secret Ballots:** Implement verifiable and private voting systems.
* **Secure Data Analysis:** Perform computations on private datasets without taking custody of raw data.
* **Collaborative Research:** Enable multiple organizations to securely aggregate and analyze data without mutual data sharing.

## Traction:

## Tokenomics:

The responsibilities of Enclave token holders include:

* Protocol Management
* Protocol Upgrades
* Dispute Resolution
* Parameter Settings
* Cancellation Burn Percentage
* Staking Deposit Amounts
* Registration Delay Period
* Decommission Delay Period
* Inactive Node Penalty Amounts
* Intermediate Slashing Penalty and Burn Ratio

## Business Model:

* When requesting a computation from Enclave, Requesters must deposit a fee proportional to the number and threshold of Ciphernodes requested, the duration for which they are required to be available, and any additional costs required by the selected Compute Provider.

data.title: fundamental review 7 - DoubleZero
data.description:
DoubleZero - 70.48%

Scorecard: [DoubleZero - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1_H2OAGu2zlHew1ZmyneuoTd3iCfOoqBmNo9_800yEwc/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* a new infrastructure layer purpose-built for distributed systems.
* Accelerating communication in high-performance distributed systems to Increase Bandwidth, Reduce Latency.
* DoubleZero is not a new L1 or L2, it is a new global base layer network – an N1 – optimized for blockchain and distributed systems.
* It's a DePIN network that taps into dedicated unused fiber to power decentralized systems like blockchains.
* Permissioned testnet is live. 
* "Increase Bandwidth, Reduce Latency" (IBRL)

## Solution:

* DoubleZero is a global fiber network for high performance distributed systems and blockchains.
* What DoubleZero does is simple: Increase Bandwidth, Reduce Latency, for all high-performance blockchains.
* DoubleZero is designed for any distributed system that demands high performance. Think machine learning training, CDNs, gaming - anything that needs guaranteed low latency and high bandwidth.
* The Federal Communications Commission has estimated that only 35% of installed fiber in the United States is being utilized, with 65% remaining unutilized. A modern fiber link, whether terrestrial or subsea, can support hundreds of terabits of data per second.

DoubleZero delivers two critical improvements:

**Increased Bandwidth:**

* Dedicated fiber links
* Optimized traffic management
* Specialized hardware at network edges
* Efficient multicast functionality

**Reduced Latency:**

* Direct fiber routes
* Edge processing with FPGAs
* Predictable, low-latency paths
* Priority routing for time-sensitive data

DoubleZero isn't just an upgrade to existing infrastructure; it's a complete paradigm shift in how we think about blockchain networking.

## Innovation:

* The protocol enables permissionless contribution of independent fiber links to create a dynamic and expansive low-level high performance global network.
* DoubleZero is not just a transport layer – the network provides filtration and verification services, conducted by network devices running open source code, to perform signature verification and deduplification on inbound data.

DoubleZero is creating what we call an **"N1" (Network Layer 1)** - a private networking stack similar to what high-frequency trading firms use, but decentralized and permissionless.

Think of it as a two-ring system:

**The Outer Ring (The Moat):** Filters out spam transactions before they even reach validators

**The Inner Ring (The Castle):** A high-performance private fiber network for legitimate transactions.

## Use Case / Features:

* This decentralized network infrastructure layer enables systems like Layer 1 and Layer 2 blockchains to be freed of communication bottlenecks and approach the maximum performance.

Globally, there are enormous amounts of unused fiber sitting underground and undersea simply going to waste. DoubleZero connects these underutilized fiber links together to form a decentralized mesh network. Thanks to the creation of a decentralized framework with DoubleZero, fiber owners can now contribute their unused, existing bandwidth to the network via smart contracts and earn tokens in return.

It's a win-win:

* Fiber owners monetize their dormant assets
* The network gains dedicated, high-performance infrastructure
* Validators get dramatically improved performance
* Users experience faster, more efficient blockchains

Anyone with underutilized private fiber links can contribute to the network, including:

* Data center operators with excess connectivity
* Enterprises with underutilized private network capacity
* Telecommunications companies with dark fiber assets
* Organizations with leased bandwidth they're not fully utilizing

The primary users include:

* **Blockchain Validators** - Operators who verify transactions and maintain consensus on Layer 1 blockchains
* **RPC Node Operators** - Services that provide API access to blockchains for dApps and users
* **MEV Searchers/Builders** - Entities involved in maximal extractable value who require extremely low latency
* **Layer 2 Operators** - Sequencers and validators for Layer 2 chains
* Content Delivery Networks
* Gaming Applications
* AI/ML Training Operations
* Enterprise Users

## Traction:

* The Firedancer client, designed to scale Solana to 1 million transactions per second, achieved this throughput on testnet running over the DoubleZero network.

## Tokenomics:

* Fiber owners join the network by joining their fiber links to DoubleZero, which are registered on smart contracts. In return, they earn tokens for their contribution turning idle fiber into value.

## Roadmap:

* Testnet beta goes live in March 2025
* Mainnet in Q3 2025

## Business Model:

* 

## Go-To-Market:

* 

## Investors:

* $28M Private Token Sale in March 2025 from
  * DragonFly Capital - 3
  * **Multicoin Capital - 10**
  * Borderless Capital - 2
  * **Foundation Capital - 10**
  * **Reciprocal Ventures - 6**
  * Superscrypt - 1
  * DBA - 0
  * Frictionless

## Community:

* 17.1k on X
* 9.8k on Discord 
* 420 on LinkedIn

## Competition: 

* 

## Team: 

* DoubleZero is created by Austin Federa, Andrew McConnell, and Mateo Ward, and launches with two core contributor teams, Firedancer and Malbec Labs.

data.title: fundamental review 6 - Rho Labs
data.description:
Rho Labs - 67.14%

Scorecard: [Rho Labs - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/19xTcLe8XYPRVibCnT-VbaVAHBVJBXiyEpPmcoYZZV14/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* The first professional-grade, on-chain rates market.
* Rho Protocol is a non-custodial platform revolutionizing institutional-grade interest rate derivatives trading.
* Live on Arbitrum. 

## Solution:

* By seamlessly integrating crypto-specific and traditional rates on-chain, it offers a transparent and secure marketplace for derivatives, providing capital-efficient opportunities for institutional crypto traders.
* It focuses on areas such as staking, digital asset lending, and funding rates.

## Innovation:

* Rho is a decentralized crypto-native interest rate derivatives market.
* At Rho we provide efficient markets for crypto-native rates such as funding rates, lending-borrowing rates, and staking rewards.
* Our platform enables users to hedge and profit from shifts in these crypto-native rates, offering tools to develop sophisticated trading strategies.

Here’s how Rho Protocol changes everything:

* **Funding rates:** The funding rate from perpetual futures can range from -20% to 100% APR, significantly impacting trading outcomes. Rho allows traders to navigate these fluctuations, reducing risks or profiting from market shifts.
* **Staking rates:** Variations in staking rates affect long-term returns for HODLers and their staked assets. Rho enables users to lock in attractive yields or protect against declining network rewards.

## Use Case / Features:

* **Explore Rate Trading as a New Asset Class:** Access unique leveraged interest rate trading opportunities with Rho Protocol. Explore the opportunities presented by the largest TradFi asset class now available in Web3.
* **Trade Perp Funding with Rho Rate Futures:** Master funding rates volatility on Binance, OKX, ByBit, and other CEX and DEX. Enhance returns on your perp positions and monetize your market views with leverage.
* **Consistent Staking Returns:** Embrace the reliability of Fixed Rate Staking. Enjoy steady staking rewards with Rho Protocol, combating the uncertainty of crypto markets with the stability seen in traditional finance - missing full stop, front page.

Key use cases:

* **Hedge and profit from funding rate shifts:** Our perpetual funding rate futures allow you to manage risk and capitalize on funding market movements.
* **Maximize staking rewards:** An incredible 14,000+ pools of liquidity exist in DeFi today. Almost all of them possess volatile rates of one kind or another. Now, you can trade staking reward rate futures to secure favourable yields or safeguard against diminishing network rewards.
* **Manage lending/borrowing rates:** Optimize borrowing costs and interest income or profit from rate changes with our comprehensive suite of lending and borrowing rate futures.

Rho Protocol’s Automated Market Maker (AMM) model and advanced risk management tools empower traders to refine strategies and succeed in the dynamic DeFi ecosystem.

* **Trade mode:**
  * In Trade mode, traders execute market orders directly against the virtual Automated Market Maker (vAMM) pool.
  * Currently, this mode supports market orders only, with fees applicable to each trade.
  * Future updates will introduce limit orders and an order book to enhance trading options.
* **Earn mode:**
  * Earn mode allows traders to act as market makers by providing liquidity to the vAMM pool.
  * Market makers in this mode earn fees from the liquidity they provide.
  * Additionally, Rho supports the use of the same account and margin for both Trade and Earn modes, enabling seamless operation across both functionalities.

DeFi’s leading interest rate derivatives powerhouse:

data.description:
Orochi Network - 70.95%

Scorecard: [Orochi Network - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17FZrv1VuBL3QA5epio4tRYFa_fZNB8t7YoCmr0fmTe4/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* The World First Verifiable Data Infrastructure.
* Live testnet. 

## Solution:

* The world’s first zkDA Layer supported by the Ethereum Foundation. Building the world’s first Verifiable Data Pipeline
* **RAMenPaSTA:** Parallelizable Scalable Transparent Arguments of Knowledge for RAM Programs.

## Innovation:

* Orochi Network solves the limits of Computation, Data Correctness and Data Availability
* Orochi Network stands out in the Verifiable Data space with our focus on zero-knowledge proofs (ZKPs) and verifiable data processing.
* Our system leverages the power of Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKPs) to create a high-performance Verifiable Data Pipeline for AI/ML models, zkApps (Zero-Knowledge Applications), dApps (Decentralized Applications) and smart contract platforms.

## Use Case / Features:

Products:

* **zkDatabase: zkDatabase employs a distributed storage engine that significantly improves data availability. It utilizes Zero-Knowledge Proof library snarkyjs to guarantee the accuracy of data in a verifiable manner.**
* **zkMemory: zkMemory is the universal memory prover in Zero-Knowledge Proof Handling the zk-proof generation for memory operations within the zkVM**
* **Orocle: Decentralized Oracle Service**
* **Orand: Orand guarantees a deterministically verifiable source of randomness by leveraging the cryptographic principles of Elliptic Curve Verifiable Random Functions (ECVRF)**
* **Orosign: Orosign is a Self-Managing Mobile App For Digital Assets that serves as an interface of Orochi Ecosystem, which can integrate multiple games and native decentralized applications.**
* **zkDA Layer:**

Title: fundamental review 5 - Orochi Network

Description:
Orochi Network - 70.95%

Scorecard: [Orochi Network - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17FZrv1VuBL3QA5epio4tRYFa_fZNB8t7YoCmr0fmTe4/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* The World First Verifiable Data Infrastructure.
* Live testnet. 

## Solution:

* The world’s first zkDA Layer supported by the Ethereum Foundation. Building the world’s first Verifiable Data Pipeline
* **RAMenPaSTA:** Parallelizable Scalable Transparent Arguments of Knowledge for RAM Programs.

## Innovation:

* Orochi Network solves the limits of Computation, Data Correctness and Data Availability
* Orochi Network stands out in the Verifiable Data space with our focus on zero-knowledge proofs (ZKPs) and verifiable data processing.
* Our system leverages the power of Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKPs) to create a high-performance Verifiable Data Pipeline for AI/ML models, zkApps (Zero-Knowledge Applications), dApps (Decentralized Applications) and smart contract platforms.

## Use Case / Features:

Products:

* **zkDatabase: zkDatabase employs a distributed storage engine that significantly improves data availability. It utilizes Zero-Knowledge Proof library snarkyjs to guarantee the accuracy of data in a verifiable manner.**
* **zkMemory: zkMemory is the universal memory prover in Zero-Knowledge Proof Handling the zk-proof generation for memory operations within the zkVM**
* **Orocle: Decentralized Oracle Service**
* **Orand: Orand guarantees a deterministically verifiable source of randomness by leveraging the cryptographic principles of Elliptic Curve Verifiable Random Functions (ECVRF)**
* **Orosign: Orosign is a Self-Managing Mobile App For Digital Assets that serves as an interface of Orochi Ecosystem, which can integrate multiple games and native decentralized applications.**
* **zkDA Layer:**

data.title: fundamental review 4 - MelodAI
data.description:
MelodAI - 64.29%

Scorecard: [MelodAI - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1VUEnxBHC4cg29vLP8aEIiKFY0vb7GbLo91p6b36Ouzg/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* MelodAI is an advanced AIGC and Multi-modal AI Agent platform

## Solution:

* MelodAI is a decentralized platform that integrates artificial intelligence with blockchain technology to facilitate music and video generation and recommendation.
* **MelodAI Node:** Running MelodAI nodes to maintain decentralized network security and earn token rewards.

## Innovation:

* The system employs a hybrid framework that combines Transformer models, Gated Recurrent Units (GRUs), and Federated Learning (FL) to enable personalized content creation and recommendation while preserving user privacy.
* **TransGRUs Framework:** MelodAI is built on a hybrid framework that combines the strengths of Transformers and Gated Recurrent Units (GRUs) for unparalleled performance in music/video generation and personalized recommendations.
* **Federated Learning:** MelodAI incorporates a cutting-edge Federated Learning (FL) framework to deliver personalized AI capabilities while maintaining the highest standards of data privacy and security.
* **Decentralized Storage:** MelodAI integrates a robust decentralised storage network to ensure the privacy and security of the network and provide a seamless experience for creators and users.

## Use Case / Features:

* This approach addresses key challenges in the contemporary music industry, including data privacy concerns, centralized distribution structures, and disparities in artist compensation.
* By incorporating blockchain technology, secure multi-party computation, and token-based economic mechanisms, MelodAI establishes a framework that enhances the interaction between content creators and audiences while maintaining data security and equitable value distribution.

## Traction:

* Download coming soon
* Open waitlist. 

## Tokenomics:

* By running a node, users can receive $MELAI tokens as a reward.
* By integrating a native token ($MELAI) into the platform, MelodAI not only fosters engagement but also establishes a decentralized and transparent economic model.
* **Utility:**
  * **Staking & Governance: Users can stake $MELAI tokens to earn staking rewards and gain voting and governance rights.**
  * **Creative Incentives: $MELAI tokens reward users for generating AI music, short videos, and participating in the creation of new content.**

## Roadmap:

## Business Model:

* 

## Go-To-Market:

AI Meme Project:

* **The Project:** The Interstice is an AI film project jointly launched by MelodAI and internationally renowned art director Yoshihito Akatsuka. MelodAI is fully responsible for the operation, promotion, issuance, and sale of related Meme tokens for The Interstice.
* **The Story:** Shihan, a lonely girl, stumbles into the metaverse using her late sister’s VR goggles. There, she befriends FUWAA and BOLT, but their adventures take a dark turn when they uncover a mysterious phenomenon—AI avatars hijacking human minds, leading to their deaths. As they investigate, they trace the cause to a real-world hacker group, only to find its leader is Shihan’s cousin and only real-world friend, Shuen. Caught between loyalty and justice, Shihan confronts Shuen while navigating both worlds. In the process, she discovers her sister has been preserved as an AI, offering guidance in her quest to save the metaverse.
* **Characters:** 

* **Roadmap:**

data.title: Funadmental Review: Balance
data.description:
Balance - 67.14%

Scorecard: [Balance - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1WeEqvnsVPX-kzv7jkHRnrn59xL7HoD8y2NQxO22F7bA/edit?gid=0#gid=0)

## Introduction:

* Balance is a protocol-based user experience enhancement infrastructure that integrates various Web3 tools.
* World’s largest gaming companion platform, with 5 million users and 450,000 EPALs.
* Not just a world-leading gaming and social companion platform, but also an AI-powered Web3 experience infrastructure designed for mass adoption
* Epal, launched in March 2020, quickly rose to prominence as the world’s largest gaming companion platform. With over 4.2 million users and 450,000 active companions (EPALs), Epal has set the industry standard for gaming companionship. 
* Epal's rapid success is rooted in its innovative approach and strong partnerships with top-tier gaming companies like Riot Games, Ubisoft, Bandai Namco, Blizzard, and EA.
* Building on the success of Epal, the team recognized the transformative power of blockchain and AI technologies, setting out to redefine the entire Web3 experience. Balance was envisioned as a flagship platform that seamlessly integrates these cutting-edge technologies, providing users and developers with a smooth transition from Web2 to Web3. It fosters innovation across various sectors, enhancing interactivity, personalization, and user engagement within decentralized ecosystems.
* Features
  * Deep Integration of AI Agents with Web3
  * Interactive Entertainment and Reward Mechanisms
  * Automated Deployment and Earnings Allocation with Balance Protocol
  * Web3-Enabled Creative Freedom and Personalization
* Balance.fun‘s product structure is divided into four layers: Application Layer, Protocol Layer, Infrastructure (Infra) Layer, and Token Layer.
* Application Layer
  * Real-life Epals
  * AI Epals:
  * AI Battle Report System
  * Game NFT:
  * AI Performance Sharing SBT
* Platform Layer
  * 1st Party Game
  * 3rd Party Game
  * Game NFT Launchpad
  * NFT Marketplace
* Protocol Layer
  * Epal Fans Token Launchpad
  * Epal Fans Protocol
  * Epal FT Exchange Protocol
* Token Layer
  * EPT Token
  * EPT Fans Token
* Infra Layer
  * Balance ID System
  * Balance Chain
  * Balance Stable Coin
  * Balance Node System
* E-PAL
  * WEB2
  * Service
  * E-PAL was launched in March 2020 and is the world's largest gaming companion platform, with 4.2m users and 450K EPALs. Just as "Google" has become synonymous with "search," "E-PAL" has become the go-to term for gaming companionship worldwide.
* Balance
  * WEB3
  * Service
  * Balance is the evolution of Epal. Based on blockchain and AI technologies, we want to create the best possible user on-line experience that intertwined these industries together.

## Solution:

* 

## Innovation:

* 

## Use Case / Features:

* 

## Traction:

![image.png](https://uploads.linear.app/3973b0e9-3f84-4e56-bc80-5f55fe46609b/80841f6d-e534-48ce-bf95-c91875abf1e7/47b26a08-f6d7-4827-b6ea-ac26dad66b91)

## Tokenomics:

* EPT is the Balance platform’s native governance token. It builds incentives between players, game developers, and the virtual marketplace so that the entire community can benefit from network activity.
* Payment Token for Gaming Companionship
* Fans Protocol Currency
  * $EPT may be used for minting and trading Fan Tokens of gaming companions
* Governance Token
* $EPT is the main Payment method for all Balance platform services
* Gas Token for Balance Chain
* Balance ID Operations

## Roadmap:

* **March 2020 E-PAL** launched with backing from a16z, Galaxy Interactive, YouTube co-founder Steve Chen, Riot Games CEO Marc Merrill, and League of Legends Director Thomas Vu. Rapid growth followed in North America and Europe, with partnerships in major games like LoL and COD.
* **January 2024 E-PAL** became the world’s largest gaming companion platform, boasting 4.2M users and 450k Epals, solidifying its reputation as the go-to term for gaming companionship worldwide.
* **February 2024** The E-PAL team shifted focus to AI and blockchain, introducing Balance, leveraging AI to enhance user experience and reduce costs, while integrating blockchain to power fan tokens using the Bonding Curve model.
* **July 2024** Balance v1.0 launched, compatible with all EVM networks. It became the only gaming platform bridging Web2 and Web3, partnering with over 150 games.
* **August 2024** Infrastructure development began with 5 layers: Application, Platform, Protocol, Infrastructure, and Token Layers, empowering users with AI-driven tools, NFT functionality, and integrated blockchain solutions. Community growth initiatives launched across Discord, Telegram, and Twitter.
* **September 2024** Balance Platform went live, integrating AI functionality and onboarding more AI Epals. The Pioneer Badge campaign attracted 300+ KOLs/communities, elevating the platform's visibility.
* **October 2024** Key collaborations launched, including Binance’s 4YA BNB event, OKX wallet NFT mint, and Bybit WSOT. Pioneer Badge minting followed.
* **November 2024** Balance Node system launched, with over 200 partnered games.
* **December 2024** Node Token Vesting began, along with the launch of fan token product and a new funding PR round.
* **January-February 2025** $EPT will list on CEXs. In-game plugins, activity-driven user rewards program, and a Line mini-game launch.
* **March-April 2025** Balance Chain debuted alongside new AI Epals. A strategic partnership with a Web2 giant will be announced, marking a major milestone.
* **May-July 2025** New AI features, Telegram mini-games, and the Balance ID system will be introduced. By July, the Application, Protocol, Infrastructure, and Token Layers will be fully operational, establishing Balance as a comprehensive Web3 ecosystem.

## Business Model:

* 

## Go-To-Market:

* 

## Investors:

* Round is led by a16z(6) and Galaxy(1)  with participation OKX(1), IOBC(1), Animoca(3), Amber(0), Netmarble, MetaW, Leland, Aptos, DWF(1), GSR(8), Taisu, founders of Youtube, Lime, Riot Games etc.
* This is the first token round, raising $9m at $100m FDV with an attractive vesting of 5% at TGE and 18m cliff. $6m already hard committed.

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXcja3n7YPlDdO0BDLAJxZ9LRNBUIiNQBxmJXCti3lMTeYCiJhhxnY1Md3fmijDsQ1fU818nBw6OYYdAXHVmW4Vicil0TuH0RRp3Nm156DtNZ-Ry7A5dxvzzRICg8YivO6-oY6Eo2Q?key=uB9UECpAP85HpbYWXd7C9HGq)

## Community:

* X - [270.1K Followers](https://x.com/RealBalanceFun/verified_followers)
* EPAL - 4.2M users
* Discord - 97K

## Competition: 

* **KGEN**

data.title: Funadmental Review: KGeN
data.description:
## Introduction:

* Kratos Gaming Network is essentially a two-pronged entity, an engagement platform and an e-commerce marketplace, tailor made for billions of gamers across emerging markets powered by the P.O.G. Engine. KGeN is being designed from the ground up with the intent to solve the LTV/CAC ratio in the gaming industry, globally.
* KGeN builds gaming communities across genres and geography where players connect through shared passion and reputation-building achievements. These verifiable player profiles offer publishers targeted insights to tailor experiences, and build loyalty
* KGeN's e-commerce platform converts gamer reputation into tangible value, enabling players to unlock exclusive rewards while providing publishers access to pre-qualified, engaged leads to reduce CAC and boost LTV.
* KGeN network’s robust foundation built on Ethereum's security, scalability, and interoperability provides developers secure onramps from Ethereum L1, and other chains. It simplifies web3 onboarding for web2 publishers by providing access to a unified global gaming network with 800 million players across key emerging markets.
* It connects gamers with personalised quests for real-world rewards, while developers benefit from targeted engagement thanks to the P.O.G. Engine boosting retention.
* An off-ramp wallet supports the ecosystem by enabling an addtional layer of KYC security. The wallet can be used by players to make purchases with token. It can also be used to offramp to fiat currency.

## Solution:

* We aim to transform how gamers and game developers connect, interact, and thrive. At the heart of our vision lies the P.O.G. Engine, which validates gamer engagement and activity to reward and empower every player and developer. Whether you’re a gamer hunting for the next big adventure or a developer looking to amplify your game’s reach, KGeN is where your journey begins.

## Innovation:

* Proof of Gamer (P.O.G.) Engine and the Kratos Gamer Network (KGeN)—a multi-chain gamer ecosystem designed to unite gamers and developers across the globe like never before.
* Proof of Gamer or the P.O.G Score is constantly evolving as it takes into account all five dimensions mentioned above and repeated here for ease of comprehension:
  * Proof of Human : PoH
  * Proof of Play : PoP
  * Proof of Skill : PoSk
  * Proof of Commerce : PoC
  * Proof of Social Network : PoSN
* POG-E
  * POG-E is an advanced Gaming Large Language Model (LLM) engineered to transform Gaming AI by integrating heterogeneous data sources and leveraging state-of-the-art technology. Built on the foundation of existing LLM architectures, POG-E incorporates real-time in-game telemetry, community-driven insights, proprietary Proof of Gamer (POG) data, Web3 protocols, and market analytics. This fusion enables the creation of intelligent, adaptive agents that deliver precise insights, automate decision-making, and drive innovation across gaming ecosystems.

## Use Case / Features:

* 

## Traction:

* Gamer Network Size: 15M +
* [https://dune.com/kgen/kgen](https://dune.com/kgen/kgen) 
* 

## Tokenomics:

* The rKGeN token is architected as a non-transferable incentive mechanism deployed on the Aptos blockchain, engineered in strict compliance with the Aptos Fungible Asset Standard (AFAS). Its primary function is to algorithmically distribute rewards to three distinct stakeholder cohorts: 
  * Oracle node operators contributing computational resources to the KGeN infrastructure
  * Gamers demonstrating sustained engagement with the KGeN platform since its genesis, and
  * Game publishers who have strategically allocated marketing capital within the KGeN ecosystem.
* $KGeN token is the governance and utility token of the Kratos Gamer Network.
  * The network value of the KGeN token will increase as we increase the number of Gamers, Clans, Game Developers, Investors and Brands participating in the ecosystem
  * Product - create buy pressure product led gratification
  * Staking - drive network growth through long-term staking
  * Business Model - token only value accrual mechanism

![image.png](https://uploads.linear.app/3973b0e9-3f84-4e56-bc80-5f55fe46609b/32583299-fb94-48e9-a7c0-0abef6a3e948/c32921b1-c898-4edc-89cd-72990ffe9b3c)

## Roadmap:

* 

## Business Model:

* 190 Revenue Partnerships
* KGeN is a profitable protocol. This profitability is expected to scale up as the network grows.

issues.full_context:
Title: Funadmental Review: KGeN

Description:
## Introduction:

* Kratos Gaming Network is essentially a two-pronged entity, an engagement platform and an e-commerce marketplace, tailor made for billions of gamers across emerging markets powered by the P.O.G. Engine. KGeN is being designed from the ground up with the intent to solve the LTV/CAC ratio in the gaming industry, globally.
* KGeN builds gaming communities across genres and geography where players connect through shared passion and reputation-building achievements. These verifiable player profiles offer publishers targeted insights to tailor experiences, and build loyalty
* KGeN's e-commerce platform converts gamer reputation into tangible value, enabling players to unlock exclusive rewards while providing publishers access to pre-qualified, engaged leads to reduce CAC and boost LTV.
* KGeN network’s robust foundation built on Ethereum's security, scalability, and interoperability provides developers secure onramps from Ethereum L1, and other chains. It simplifies web3 onboarding for web2 publishers by providing access to a unified global gaming network with 800 million players across key emerging markets.
* It connects gamers with personalised quests for real-world rewards, while developers benefit from targeted engagement thanks to the P.O.G. Engine boosting retention.
* An off-ramp wallet supports the ecosystem by enabling an addtional layer of KYC security. The wallet can be used by players to make purchases with token. It can also be used to offramp to fiat currency.

## Solution:

* We aim to transform how gamers and game developers connect, interact, and thrive. At the heart of our vision lies the P.O.G. Engine, which validates gamer engagement and activity to reward and empower every player and developer. Whether you’re a gamer hunting for the next big adventure or a developer looking to amplify your game’s reach, KGeN is where your journey begins.

## Innovation:

* Proof of Gamer (P.O.G.) Engine and the Kratos Gamer Network (KGeN)—a multi-chain gamer ecosystem designed to unite gamers and developers across the globe like never before.
* Proof of Gamer or the P.O.G Score is constantly evolving as it takes into account all five dimensions mentioned above and repeated here for ease of comprehension:
  * Proof of Human : PoH
  * Proof of Play : PoP
  * Proof of Skill : PoSk
  * Proof of Commerce : PoC
  * Proof of Social Network : PoSN
* POG-E
  * POG-E is an advanced Gaming Large Language Model (LLM) engineered to transform Gaming AI by integrating heterogeneous data sources and leveraging state-of-the-art technology. Built on the foundation of existing LLM architectures, POG-E incorporates real-time in-game telemetry, community-driven insights, proprietary Proof of Gamer (POG) data, Web3 protocols, and market analytics. This fusion enables the creation of intelligent, adaptive agents that deliver precise insights, automate decision-making, and drive innovation across gaming ecosystems.

## Use Case / Features:

* 

## Traction:

* Gamer Network Size: 15M +
* [https://dune.com/kgen/kgen](https://dune.com/kgen/kgen) 
* 

## Tokenomics:

* The rKGeN token is architected as a non-transferable incentive mechanism deployed on the Aptos blockchain, engineered in strict compliance with the Aptos Fungible Asset Standard (AFAS). Its primary function is to algorithmically distribute rewards to three distinct stakeholder cohorts: 
  * Oracle node operators contributing computational resources to the KGeN infrastructure
  * Gamers demonstrating sustained engagement with the KGeN platform since its genesis, and
  * Game publishers who have strategically allocated marketing capital within the KGeN ecosystem.
* $KGeN token is the governance and utility token of the Kratos Gamer Network.
  * The network value of the KGeN token will increase as we increase the number of Gamers, Clans, Game Developers, Investors and Brands participating in the ecosystem
  * Product - create buy pressure product led gratification
  * Staking - drive network growth through long-term staking
  * Business Model - token only value accrual mechanism

data.title: Tech Review: Synternet
data.description:
## Scorecard : [Synetrnet Scorecard](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1t9cOhlSaOtd3nsJAdC85S7WYNrO3qi8rNheIemwWHi0/edit?gid=0#gid=0)

## Notes

* TRUSTLESS protocol for smart defi
* Synternet is a trustless, permissionless protocol designed for cross-chain asset management. It helps investors find yield and mitigate risk, while enabling users to verify the collateral backing multi-chain assets.
* Developers can build on a composable Web3 data network, scaling their dApps globally.
* Synternet is designed for individuals who want real-time asset tracking and risk control, institutions requiring instant risk insights and exposure management, blockchains looking to implement proactive risk mitigation, and investors aiming to safeguard portfolios and react swiftly to collateral risks.
* The Synternet Protocol addresses systemic risks in DeFi by securing essential components, including wrapped assets, liquid staking and restaking tokens, and cross-chain bridges, which form the backbone of decentralized finance. It leverages AI-powered monitoring and agents tailored specifically for DeFi applications to ensure transparency and resilience.
* The Synternet Protocol offers the fastest, trustless Web3 data delivery, enabling seamless access to data across any blockchain. It empowers users to interpret cross-chain intelligence and take action through its modular execution layer.
* The Synterntet Protocol utilizes a publish-subscribe model, where data providers (publishers) stream data to interested parties (subscribers). This model offers several advantages over traditional request-response architectures, like RPCs and APIs.
* Synternet is a blockchain that powers modular, interoperable data infrastructure across all major chains. At its core lies the Data Layer, a protocol serving as the customizable execution layer between all blockchains. Designed for efficiency, security, and interoperability, the Data Layer enables a fully decentralized data exchange for developers, organizations, and users.
* key Players
  * Publishers: Node operators that provide on-chain data and stream it.
  * Subscribers: Developers and dApps consuming the data.
  * Brokers: Network nodes that relay data from publishers to subscribers.
  * Observers: Nodes that monitor data delivery.
* There are three major components that make up the Synternet Data Layer protocol:
  * Publish-Subscribe protocol and its SDKs,
  * Application-specific chain (app chain) with utility token,
  * Data Layer tokenomics.
* Synternet’s App Chain is built on top of Cosmos SDK and uses [CometBFT](https://docs.cometbft.com/v0.37/) flavor. There are two types of actors engaged in this layer of the protocol:
  * Validators who are responsible for running consensus protocol
  * Delegators who delegate their stake and thus make the chain and overall protocol more secure
* 
* Products
  * Uniswap Tracker
    * Instantly access all swaps across multiple blockchains and Uniswap versions, keeping you ahead of the market. Real-time price discovery from diverse liquidity pools lets you monitor price movements as they happen
  * Yield Explorer
    * Real-time OSINT tracking of smart contracts and assets across blockchains. Create live dashboards, integrate automated responses, and detect anomalies with real-time alerts. Benefit from trustless monitoring to boost transparency and participate in BTC-Fi growth.
  * SYNTOSHI AI Agent
    * AI Agent Powered by On-Chain Data
*  the Synternet Protocol serves as an independent DeFi infrastructure powered by $SYNT, a token tied to Total Value Secured. $SYNT offers tokenized exposure to DeFi’s growth, aligning incentives with the ecosystem’s evolution.
  * Payment Rail
  * Network Security: SYNT allows providers to stake tokens to operate network nodes.
  * Protocol Governance

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXd2MRgeghbPaaBuEDed-nR24llFtDsUMt3mCD4ET7In0YbQ3--ZD8dNJSuFeDWqJUjiPIWChHXuHzL_vKCSrMVrSFjVnndueWqL_7s6uIwY0TqL2CIVBEUDcBHrDwVk2e7UIrb1-g?key=cVCWn-fwK63lgXVvWt5DQPV0)

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXdx4gq1madtrOK6AW8rCwGdTOIBGCDrt6NFdlbjoWVgf5cgiH09LyAQtNakMgnaBfN4VjKalje7JUgFEsJDID5LwIUrXC862ck-7Bl3X6ZNKotVmMXiWY0Iv0Fj11eXawEve9jy3A?key=cVCWn-fwK63lgXVvWt5DQPV0)

data.title: Tech Review: Fleek
data.description:
## Scorecard : [Fleek Scorecard](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1zH_N7REbNkwM0zFECduyT58CDWNHu4rpZ6HDkvEzjUM/edit?gid=0#gid=0)

## Notes

* Fleek is the Vercel for AI Agents—providing everything you need to build and integrate AI agents into any product, complete with trusted execution environments for secure, scalable operations.
* Fleek is an edge-optimized cloud platform that allows users to build and deploy AI agents, websites and applications efficiently, empowering developers to build fast.
*   5 B2B customers being onboarded now, including Eliza Labs (ai16z) and Venice AI (300K users). Those 2 deals alone should result in $2M+ in ARR run rate in next 12 months.
* Beginning to onboard customers to Fleek Machines TEE infrastructure in March (used for AI agents but also offered as a standalone product with high revenue potential). Convos with Flashbots and Ethereum Foundation and other prospects planning to leverage the infra. 
* Token utility: Node operators stake FLK to operate nodes on Fleek Network; Developers stake FLK for discounted access to Fleek services; buy and burn FLK token with portion of revenue
* Fleek is powered by the edge-optimized cloud network known as [Fleek Network](https://fleek.xyz/docs/infrastructure/) and it gives access to a variety of features and capabilities that makes it easy to manage cloud infrastructure.
* Fleek makes it easy to build and deploy next-generation apps and AI agents in minutes on an open-source, verifiable, auto-scalable cloud platform.
* Deploy in a flash
  * Git integration, actions & check runs
  * Deploy previews with every pull request
  * automatic updates on every push, with zero downtime
* Fleek runs your app in 100+ edge locations to ensure fast loading worldwide.
* Using either the Platform, CLI, or SDK you can build how you want.
* Seamless domain management & free SSL certificates (Lets Encrypt)
* Fleek has released one-click deployments for autonomous AI agents. This will allow developers to simply focus on the agent’s personality traits and trustlessly deploy AI agents on Fleek. With support for Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs) and remote attestations, Fleek ensures that the execution of AI agents is both secure and verifiable.
* Fleek’s hosting services allow users to easily upload, maintain, store and serve static sites. Our goal is to provide a user-friendly platform that can help developers streamline their use of infrastructure.
* Fleek is an edge-optimized cloud platform where users can prepare, host and deploy Web sites and applications. It enables developers to build fast, performant apps.
* Fleek supports a variety of frameworks and libraries for building sites and applications. It is largely framework-agnostic, though applications that leverage more popular frameworks can be auto-detected and configured with appropriate build settings, whereas applications built using less popular frameworks require some minimal configuration on the user’s part
  * Fleek supports Next.js and offers a wide variety of features that make it easy to deploy all your Next.js applications.
  * We will find the correct Docker image from our [Dockerhub organization](https://hub.docker.com/u/fleek) depending on the detected framework and offer support for additional frameworks through custom Docker images users create.
  * 
  * Fleek Machines are lightweight TEE VMs with docker support that offer builders a seamless way to leverage long-running (TEEs) for verifiable and/or confidential computing use cases.
  * Fleek Functions are code snippets that are executed server-side using Fleek Network’s on-chain cloud infrastructure.
  * Fleek’s storage service enables the decentralized storage of your files.
* Fleek Network is lightning-fast on-chain cloud infrastructure that provides highly-performant, edge-optimized cloud and Web services.
* It enables developers to work with a high-performance, permissionless, self-sovereign and open-source system requiring no DevOps and at very low cost. This enables developers to spend more time with their codebase and less time on the management of their application.
* The Fleek Platform SDK is a TypeScript library that allows you to interact with Fleek’s services. It’s composed of methods that you can leverage to build your own application on top of Fleek’s services.
