data.title: Tech Review: Cycle Network
data.description:
## Scorecard :[Cycle Network Scorecard](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1M6-XQAOucBo-kKPuBQMykhQL21hyXJRnL9KN_lzxcZM/edit?gid=0#gid=0)

## Notes

* Cycle Network is a bridgeless aggregate liquidity network for all blockchains, whether L1s, L2s, EVMs, or non-EVMs.
* Chain{less} Liquidity Abstraction via Secure and Verifiable Chain Abstraction
* By providing a chains network with seamless liquidity and functionality across all chains, and self custody function, aka settlement layer, shared liquidity model, and AA model, Cycle aims to liberate developers from repetitive tasks, from different layer structures to information/asset synchronization and deployment
* Empower all dApps with our powerful SDK, connect to any chain, any wallet, and experience a truly seamless UX
* Any network or project can instantly achieve chain abstraction and
* chainless shared liquidity across all chains by integrating the Cycle SDK
* Our SDK can be integrated into your dApp or network in just 30 minutes.
* Integrate our Roll_in & Roll_Out interfaces to easily achieve chainless liquidity abstraction. Everything you need is in the SDK documentation.
* Cycle Network employs Verifiable State Aggregation (VSA) to achieve chain abstraction
* Key Components of Cycle Network
  * Omni State Channel Indexer(OSCI)
    * An Omni State Channel Indexer (OSCI) is a decentralized multi-chain indexer that operates omni-chain indexing with decentralized governance to allow for a trustless validation & determination of the state of the Cycle ledger at any given moment.
  * Decentralized Aggregate Sequencer
    * The Sequencer is a fundamental component of Cycle infrastructure which is responsible for managing transactions, generating blocks which are validated by mutual verification mechanism and aggregating transaction states.
  * Zero- Knowledge Hardware Acceleration
    * Cycle Network enhances the developer experience by using ZK Rollup to reduce the latency of Rollout.
  * FullyHomomorphic Encryption
    * CycleNetwork employs Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) to enable computations on encrypted data without needing decryption. This ensures that sensitive information remains secure throughout cross-chain operations, offering complete privacy guarantees to users.
* Cycle Network introduces a decentralized, bridgeless hub that seamlessly interconnects all blockchains. With the proliferation of Layer 2 solutions and numerous chains, this innovation ensures that end-users and developers are no longer isolated or fragmented. It enables everyone to share liquidity, pay gas fees, and sign transactions without the need for traditional bridges.
* Cycle can be connected by using any EVM-supported wallet like MetaMask or can be directly accessed by JavaScript, which imports libraries such as Web3.js, Ether, etc. The recommended way to interact with Cycle is to use [Cycle-JS-SDK](https://app.gitbook.com/o/zsuLq6nkAsruS3oE16NY/s/TzgQbqR8ub1ustDteGf4/\~/changes/32/cycle-js-sdk), which integrates multiple steps into a single function call to let developers easily access cycle's core features without concentrating on coding details.
* Cycle Network is a universal, secure, and verifiable chain abstraction architecture, which will use the restaking service provided by Symbiotic to run some tasks, improving the security and availability of the system.Operators eligible to provide infrastructure for Cycle will obtain restake from Symbiotic, run DAC (Data Availability Committe) nodes, and provide decentralized DA (Data Availability) services for Cycle Network
* Cycle Network presents an omni state solution based on Verifiable State Aggregation (VSA). From the perspective of layered blockchain architecture, the framework of Cycle can be represented as the Security Layer, the Extended Layers, and Cycle Layer.
  * The Security Layer is defined as a blockchain layer that provides the safety and liveness of transaction state. This layer can be either Bitcoin, Ethereum, or any other highly decentralized blockchain. 
  * The Extended Layers refer to the source layers and destination layers where all transaction state and data state are located. This includes all Layer 1s, Layer 2s, and application blockchains. 
  * The Extended Layers refer to the source layers and destination layers where all transaction state and data state are located. This includes all Layer 1s, Layer 2s, and application blockchains. 
* CYCLE-CORE-SDK
  * CYCLE-CORE-SDK is a highly integrated development tool that allows developers to easily implement their applications empowered by Cycle. It provides JavaScript interfaces to interact with Cycle Network in all aspects. Just two steps Rollin and Rollout to achieve chain abstraction.
  * CYCLE-CORE-SDK is currently undergoing rapid iteration, and in subsequent version upgrades, some interfaces may not be backward compatible.
* Goose
  * Earn Exceptional Hybrid Yields
  * Golden Goose is a super app incubated on the Cycle Netwobrk, utilizing the Cycle Settlement & Clearing Layer to deliver repal super hybrid yields to different types of investors.

    ![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXcqz8qiNkXzQ_CPbrvgWWxEaDg63zEGN2-6rWmtm90h3H2ZXs4eDgfgCF0p49_u1mCs-s7G33GoDxnmor7UZyivewRg9p4YO0u2E1VHLBPwnbi-pSz5qMPJa5yKmpRvTtfrwM5c3Q?key=AA30_QaxLGzxhZK7Ae9IvPAl)
* Piggy Bank
  * All-Chain Asset Management Platform
* Tapup
  * All-Chain Meme LaunchPad
  * TapUp integrates Telegram with Cycle Network, allowing users to easily create and launch meme coins across all chains without traditional bridges. It connects Web2 and Web3, reaching Telegram's 900 million active users and making Web3 more accessible.

issues.full_context:
Title: Tech Review: Cycle Network

Description:
## Scorecard :[Cycle Network Scorecard](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1M6-XQAOucBo-kKPuBQMykhQL21hyXJRnL9KN_lzxcZM/edit?gid=0#gid=0)

## Notes

* Cycle Network is a bridgeless aggregate liquidity network for all blockchains, whether L1s, L2s, EVMs, or non-EVMs.
* Chain{less} Liquidity Abstraction via Secure and Verifiable Chain Abstraction
* By providing a chains network with seamless liquidity and functionality across all chains, and self custody function, aka settlement layer, shared liquidity model, and AA model, Cycle aims to liberate developers from repetitive tasks, from different layer structures to information/asset synchronization and deployment
* Empower all dApps with our powerful SDK, connect to any chain, any wallet, and experience a truly seamless UX
* Any network or project can instantly achieve chain abstraction and
* chainless shared liquidity across all chains by integrating the Cycle SDK
* Our SDK can be integrated into your dApp or network in just 30 minutes.
* Integrate our Roll_in & Roll_Out interfaces to easily achieve chainless liquidity abstraction. Everything you need is in the SDK documentation.
* Cycle Network employs Verifiable State Aggregation (VSA) to achieve chain abstraction
* Key Components of Cycle Network
  * Omni State Channel Indexer(OSCI)
    * An Omni State Channel Indexer (OSCI) is a decentralized multi-chain indexer that operates omni-chain indexing with decentralized governance to allow for a trustless validation & determination of the state of the Cycle ledger at any given moment.
  * Decentralized Aggregate Sequencer
    * The Sequencer is a fundamental component of Cycle infrastructure which is responsible for managing transactions, generating blocks which are validated by mutual verification mechanism and aggregating transaction states.
  * Zero- Knowledge Hardware Acceleration
    * Cycle Network enhances the developer experience by using ZK Rollup to reduce the latency of Rollout.
  * FullyHomomorphic Encryption
    * CycleNetwork employs Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) to enable computations on encrypted data without needing decryption. This ensures that sensitive information remains secure throughout cross-chain operations, offering complete privacy guarantees to users.
* Cycle Network introduces a decentralized, bridgeless hub that seamlessly interconnects all blockchains. With the proliferation of Layer 2 solutions and numerous chains, this innovation ensures that end-users and developers are no longer isolated or fragmented. It enables everyone to share liquidity, pay gas fees, and sign transactions without the need for traditional bridges.
* Cycle can be connected by using any EVM-supported wallet like MetaMask or can be directly accessed by JavaScript, which imports libraries such as Web3.js, Ether, etc. The recommended way to interact with Cycle is to use [Cycle-JS-SDK](https://app.gitbook.com/o/zsuLq6nkAsruS3oE16NY/s/TzgQbqR8ub1ustDteGf4/\~/changes/32/cycle-js-sdk), which integrates multiple steps into a single function call to let developers easily access cycle's core features without concentrating on coding details.
* Cycle Network is a universal, secure, and verifiable chain abstraction architecture, which will use the restaking service provided by Symbiotic to run some tasks, improving the security and availability of the system.Operators eligible to provide infrastructure for Cycle will obtain restake from Symbiotic, run DAC (Data Availability Committe) nodes, and provide decentralized DA (Data Availability) services for Cycle Network
* Cycle Network presents an omni state solution based on Verifiable State Aggregation (VSA). From the perspective of layered blockchain architecture, the framework of Cycle can be represented as the Security Layer, the Extended Layers, and Cycle Layer.
  * The Security Layer is defined as a blockchain layer that provides the safety and liveness of transaction state. This layer can be either Bitcoin, Ethereum, or any other highly decentralized blockchain. 
  * The Extended Layers refer to the source layers and destination layers where all transaction state and data state are located. This includes all Layer 1s, Layer 2s, and application blockchains. 
  * The Extended Layers refer to the source layers and destination layers where all transaction state and data state are located. This includes all Layer 1s, Layer 2s, and application blockchains. 
* CYCLE-CORE-SDK
  * CYCLE-CORE-SDK is a highly integrated development tool that allows developers to easily implement their applications empowered by Cycle. It provides JavaScript interfaces to interact with Cycle Network in all aspects. Just two steps Rollin and Rollout to achieve chain abstraction.
  * CYCLE-CORE-SDK is currently undergoing rapid iteration, and in subsequent version upgrades, some interfaces may not be backward compatible.
* Goose
  * Earn Exceptional Hybrid Yields
  * Golden Goose is a super app incubated on the Cycle Netwobrk, utilizing the Cycle Settlement & Clearing Layer to deliver repal super hybrid yields to different types of investors.

    ![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXcqz8qiNkXzQ_CPbrvgWWxEaDg63zEGN2-6rWmtm90h3H2ZXs4eDgfgCF0p49_u1mCs-s7G33GoDxnmor7UZyivewRg9p4YO0u2E1VHLBPwnbi-pSz5qMPJa5yKmpRvTtfrwM5c3Q?key=AA30_QaxLGzxhZK7Ae9IvPAl)
* Piggy Bank
  * All-Chain Asset Management Platform
* Tapup
  * All-Chain Meme LaunchPad
  * TapUp integrates Telegram with Cycle Network, allowing users to easily create and launch meme coins across all chains without traditional bridges. It connects Web2 and Web3, reaching Telegram's 900 million active users and making Web3 more accessible.

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXcP8we6ta-bWraNVNB5IxIWo7tc-RGSUr3Jfs9AVvsTsg_nh55RpKz9JWrMi58cKQgsyjbUISFijdOfaTUW_SgigkP9aeX0pgIbMr7Cvy4jihw1_b3hjJ_wjZCEvsVpBdpOqAWz3Q?key=AA30_QaxLGzxhZK7Ae9IvPAl)

data.title: fundamental review 3 - GrabWay
data.description:
GrabWay - 65.24%

Scorecard: [GrabWay - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1miCxdeNTCnWvToJmT8UuAp001JQ2lWBA2Rhd8qpnA6M/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* Earn As Your Move
* GrabWay is a blockchain platform that turns your driving miles into real earnings, letting users monetize their daily travels.

## Solution:

* GrabWay is an innovative mobile application designed to empower drivers, gig workers, and frequent travelers by turning their everyday movements into a source of income.

## Innovation:

* GrabWay introduces a unique system where users can earn points based on the distance they travel. These points can then be converted into real-world earnings, creating a new and exciting way for individuals to monetize their time on the road.
* At the core of GrabWay is the concept of NFT-based vehicles (NTT), which users purchase and use within the app.
* Each NTT not only represents a digital asset but also serves as the key to unlocking earnings as users move about their daily routines. The more they travel, the more they earn—making GrabWay a game-changer for those who spend significant time driving.

## Use Case / Features:

* **Transform Travel into Rewards**
  * GrabWay is the first app to convert daily travel into valuable digital assets. Whether you’re commuting, running errands, or taking leisure trips, every mile counts.
  * Optimize your movements and get rewarded with GPoints, turning fuel and effort into real-world value.
* **Seamless Blockchain Integration**
  * Earn effortlessly without needing blockchain or crypto expertise.
  * Simply install the GrabWay app, connect your wallet, and let your smartphone become a profit-generating engine powered by GrabWay’s ecosystem.
* **Universal and Eco-Conscious Design**
  * GrabWay rewards all travel types, from ride-share drivers to casual commuters.
  * Encourages efficient route planning, contributing to financial savings and a positive environmental impact.
* **Engaging Gameplay with Real Value**
  * Compete in exciting races through Dapp to win even more GPoints.
  * Upgrade and maintain your cars for maximum efficiency and rewards.
* **Marketplace and NFT Integration**
  * Trade and upgrade cars as NFTs in the GrabWay Marketplace, offering a transparent and secure blockchain-based trading experience.
  * Export your cars as NFTs to explore more opportunities in the marketplace.
* **Community-Centered Innovation**
  * Built on a secure blockchain foundation, GrabWay ensures transparent transactions and efficient token conversions.
  * Shape the future of GrabWay through community-driven governance and participation.

* **Telegram Mini App:**
  * **GRABWAY integrates seamlessly with the Telegram Mini App platform, offering players a simple yet captivating gameplay experience. Featuring stunning graphics and an array of supercars, GRABWAY promises to captivate players at first glance.**
* **Mobile App:**
  * **GRABWAY mobile app allows users to own a virtual car and earn profits by accumulating the distance they travel in their daily lives. Using various transportation methods, these distances are converted into GPoints, offering a unique "drive-to-earn" experience.**
* **Dapp:**
  * **The GRABWAY DApp serves as the central hub for user interactions, combining blockchain technology with distributed data to enable fast and secure transactions. It is the gateway to the GRABWAY ecosystem, empowering users to manage assets and participate seamlessly.**

## Traction:

* 

## Tokenomics:

* $GRAB launched in January 2025 on BSC, climbed to ATH of $4.3M MC, and is currently at $3.9M MC and $7M FD.
* Total supply 60M, circulating 33M

## Roadmap:

* Phase 1
  * Collect and Business Building 
  * Team Building
  * Research and GRABWAY mechanism developing
* Phase 2
  * UI/UX design
  * GRABWAY application development
  * Block-Chain and NFT Integration
* Phase 3
  * Internal Testing & Bug Fixing
  * Logic enhancement
  * Marketplace building
* Phase 4
  * Official Website Launching
  * Beta Testing
  * Fundraising Starting
  * Apply for CH Play and Apple Store
  * IDO & DEX listing
  * Limited NFT Offering
* Phase 5
  * Mainnet Launching
  * Updating

## Business Model:

* 

## Go-To-Market:

* 

## Investors:

* 

## Community:

* 14k on X
* 23k on Telegram 

## Competition: 

* 

## Team: 

* **John Smith Founder & CEO:** John Smith is the visionary behind GrabWay, bringing over 10 years of experience in the tech and mobility industries.
* **Emily Bronte Co-Founder & CTO:** Emily Bronte is the technological backbone of GrabWay, with extensive expertise in software development and blockchain technology. Holding a degree in Computer Science from a Havard university, she has spent over 8 years building scalable solutions for tech startups.
* **Miles Helder Chief Marketing Officer (CMO):** Miles Helder is the marketing strategist behind GrabWay's growth. With over 7 years of experience in digital marketing and brand management, Miles has a proven track record of building strong, recognizable brands in the tech space.
* **Thomas Strevens Lead Developer:** Thomas Strevens leads the development team at GrabWay, ensuring that the platform is robust, secure, and user-friendly. With a background in full-stack development and a passion for creating seamless user experiences, Thomas has been instrumental in translating the team’s vision into a functional and efficient application.
* **Sarah Hager Business Development Manager (BDM):** Sarah Hager is the driving force behind GrabWay's strategic partnerships and growth initiatives. With over 6 years of experience in business development across various tech sectors, Sarah excels at identifying new opportunities and building lasting relationships with key stakeholders.

data.title: fundamental review 2 - STP Network (AWE Network)
data.description:
STP Network - 62.86%

Scorecard: [STP Network - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1q005AtyEWOK6BDAKjZueE9wKTHmMeAECYvPRv-nrNHg/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* Autonomous Worlds: A New Era for AI Agents
* Clique, a Layer 3 on Base for AI Enhanced Gaming.
* Launch worlds that enable Al Agents to think, learn, and grow.

STP (Soon to be AWE Network) is opening the portal to Autonomous Worlds, where AI Agents collaborate, adapt and evolve. The Autonomous Worlds Engine (AWE) is a modular framework enabling the creation of self-sustaining worlds for scalable agent-agent and human-agent collaboration.

## Solution:

* STP Network is a blockchain project that seeks to expand the global use of digital assets. It has developed The Verse Network, which is an interconnect cloud that is built to serve DAOs and DeFi projects.
* Standard Tokenization Protocol Token (STPT) plays a major role in the Verse Network, on which developer teams can build scalable, decentralized, and secure applications on top of the network.

## Innovation:

* The Verse Network aims to be highly scalable, censorship-resistant, and offer support for multiple virtual machines, not just EVM.
* It is also resistant to front-running, this means that transactions will be validated in the order that they occur, and no one can manipulate the order by paying more.

The Autonomous Worlds Engine (AWE) is modular framework designed to create, simulate, and evolve persistent ecosystems where AI agents collaborate and adapt.

* **World Orchestration Module:** Generates and governs Worlds, enforcing rules and simulating agent-environment interactions.
* **Agent Orchestration Module:** Generates and governs AI agents with embedded autonomy.
* **Event Orchestration Module:** Curates and evolves events that define the World’s historical trajectory and agent incentives.

## Use Case / Features:

The Verse Network’s architecture is fundamental to the way it operates. It consists of four crucial layers:

* Application Layer, this is where smart contracts and dApps are deployed;
* Execution Layer, virtual machines are supported in this layer;
* Network Layer, nodes are operated in this layer;
* Consensus Layer, 1,000 of validators are responsible for providing rapid and secure transaction validation.

The Verse ecosystem has a strong focus on DAOs, as such supports dApps surrounding their functionality. This includes DAO builder dApps, DAO market data tools, as well as DAO reputation dApps.

* Autonomous Worlds are dynamic persistent environments where Al Agents can collaborate and adapt to solve complex problems.
* They enable transparent multi-agent simulations that could solve the challenges of today to shape the possibilities of tomorrow.
* **Agent-Agent and Human-Agent Collaboration:** Foster dynamic interactions to tackle complex challenges collectively.
* **Simulations and Economic Modeling:** Simulate and refine systems in a risk-free environment.
* **Proof of Agent Autonomy:** Validate agent parameters and memory immutability.
* **Scale Multi-Agent Simulation:** Enables hundreds of agents to collaborate in Autonomous Worlds. Reduce synchronization overhead, maximize parallelism and handle large scale environments with hundreds of agents.

AWNS, which stands for **Autonomous Worlds Naming Service**, introduces a novel approach to digital identity with its unique domain ending, .aw. It serves as the foundational layer for the AW ecosystem, enabling users to effortlessly traverse Autonomous Worlds, participate in on-chain games, and engage with the broader web3 landscape.

## Traction:

* Our ecosystem consists of 15,000 progressive onchain token holders and world contributors.
* Ecosystem: [https://www.stp.network/ecosystem](https://www.stp.network/ecosystem)

## Tokenomics:

* $STPT is the native token, launched in June 2019, climbed to an ATH of $280M and is currently trading at $204 MC and FDV.
* STPT is the Verse Network’s primary medium of exchange, it is an ERC-20 token. It can be used for paying fees on the platform as well as earning rewards.
* STPT Holders are entitled to take part in platform governance, as well as making key proposals in the ecosystem.

## Roadmap:

* 

## Business Model:

* 

## Go-To-Market:

* 

## Investors:

* $2M Pre-Seed in April 2019
* $7M in Private Token Sale in May 2019 from
  * Alphabit Digital Currency Fund - 0
  * **Neo - 4**
  * Block Capital - 0
* $750k IEO in June 2019 on Bittrex platform.

## Community:

* 53k on X
* 12.5k on Telegram 

## Competition: 

* 

## Team: 

*

data.title: fundamental review 1 - Up Network
data.description:
Up Network - 67.14%

Scorecard: [Up Network - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1AYZqutMYIMNIXd9ivutudg4IxT-OFsPa1RdvtwCpx7g/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* Up Network is a web3 mobile devices abstraction layer.
* Web3 abstraction with personal agent. 
* We are building the world’s largest decentralized mobile network.
* Up Mobile launched and sold out, 11,000 units, at the cost of $999.
* Web3 Galsses are coming soon.

## Solution:

* Simplifies intent-to-action cross chains and 18 billion smart devices globally 
* By simplifying complexity, championing data ownership, and nurturing decentralized intelligence, Up Network helps individuals transform their data into valuable assets while enjoying personalized, context-aware experiences.

## Innovation:

* Web3 simplification via natural language
* Attention abstraction from social and on-chain data
* No-code agent/contract creation and automation 
* Device/Chain/Framework Agnostic 

Agent as a Service with smart devices, introducing the world’s first Web3 AI smart glasses in collaboration with DreamSmart and Google Gemini.

**The Brain:**

* At its core lies the Up Protocol—a powerful framework enabling seamless communication and data exchange between AI agents and smart devices.
* This protocol simplifies complexity, ensuring devices operate in harmony while unlocking new possibilities for interaction and intelligence.
* The Up Chain forms our secure blockchain foundation, delivering security, transparency, and decentralization.
* The Up Protocol leverages this infrastructure to connect smart devices and AI agents seamlessly.

**The Heart:**

* At the heart of this ecosystem, the Up OS serves as a cutting-edge operating system bridging users with billions of devices through intuitive, personalized experiences.
* The AI Agent Store extends these capabilities as a dynamic hub where developers and users collaborate to create, discover, and monetize custom AI agents.
* Meanwhile, the Data Asset Marketplace revolutionizes data ownership by enabling users to tokenize and trade their anonymized metadata, unlocking the value of personal data securely and ethically.
* The Up DAO empowers users to shape the network's future through decentralized governance. This transparent, community-driven model creates a user-first network that prioritizes privacy, innovation, and decentralized possibilities.

**Next BilliOn MOveMeNt:**

* Up Network is building the world’s largest smart mobile node network and first Decentralized Mobile Infrastructure Network (DeMIN) on Movement, integrating mobile devices with blockchain via our Web3 abstraction layer.
* To lead this initiative, Up Network is dedicating 51% of its total supply towards ecosystem incentives.
* The Decentralized Mobile Infrastructure Network (DeMIN) harnesses the collective power of individual smartphones and devices.
* Unlike traditional centralized infrastructure, DeMIN distributes the operations across millions of devices, each acting as a lite node.
* This enhances the network’s resilience, scalability, and security, while also putting control back into the hands of the users.

## Use Case / Features:

* Up Network is an AI agent operating system that connects user intent, AI agents, services with 18 billion smart devices globally.
* With a focus on seamless human-machine interaction, data ownership, and decentralized intelligence, Up Network simplifies complexity and delivers personalized, context-aware experiences while ensuring user privacy and control in the post-smartphone era.
* With local processing, a privacy-first design, and Web3 incentives, Up Network does what no other system can: it connects users, smart devices, and AI agents into one intuitive, powerful ecosystem.

* **Your Data Your Asset:**
  * **With local storage and anonymization, your data stays securely on your device—completely private and entirely yours.**
  * Through tokenization, we transform your anonymized data into an asset you can monetize, empowering you to decide how it’s used and who benefits from it. And with lightweight AI processing on-device, only anonymized insights are shared—ensuring your privacy is never compromised.
* **Opt-in, Share & Earn:**
  * **With Opt-in, Share & Earn, you stay in full control. Share only anonymized metadata from your chosen datasets—your raw data never leaves your device.**
  * **As you contribute your data to the marketplace, you earn rewards instantly, plus a share of revenue when companies purchase the insights. And through on-device processing, we ensure your privacy is never compromised.**
* **Context-Aware Responses From Agents:**
  * **With Up Network, your AI agents deliver deeply personalized, context-aware experiences—all while keeping your data private and in your control.**
* **Discover More Agents:**
  * **Up Network lets you discover and access new AI agents that elevate your daily experiences. From personalized assistants to specialized agents, the store empowers you to unlock richer, more intuitive interactions—all tailored to your needs.**
  * **For developers, this is your stage. List your agents for free or amplify visibility with promotions to reach an engaged audience eager to connect.. Every transaction on the Up Chain opens up opportunities for earning additional rewards.**
* **User Powered Economy:**
  * **The Up Network economy is a user-centric system built on the "Share to Earn" model. Users can monetize their anonymized data while keeping full control and privacy. By sharing metadata like interaction patterns and health metrics, users earn tokens and rewards instantly.**
  * **The ecosystem creates opportunities for developers, companies, and device makers. The AI Agent Store lets developers monetize their AI agents, while the Data Asset Marketplace provides companies access to anonymized datasets for better user experiences.**
  * **Device makers benefit further by using tokens to drive engagement. Through token staking and reward programs, they build customer loyalty while fueling product innovation.**
  * **Data companies, in turn, access carefully curated, anonymized datasets that provide actionable insights, creating a seamless flow of value among all participants.**

## Traction:

* Performance: 130K+ dau, 410K+ total nodes, 425K+ community.
* Early partners including Telegram, Movement, Polygon, Filecoin, OKx, DreamSmart, Animoca, ElizaOS, 0G, Sentient.

## Tokenomics:

* The Up Network token economy is designed to incentivize active participation and ensure the sustainable growth of the ecosystem.\\
* The UpToken serves as the primary utility token within the network, facilitating transactions, staking, and governance participation.
* $UP token captures value from agent services, data markets, and enterprise licensing.

Up Network - 67.14%

* Up Network is a web3 mobile devices abstraction layer.

* We are building the world’s largest decentralized mobile network.
* Up Mobile launched and sold out, 11,000 units, at the cost of $999.
* Web3 Galsses are coming soon.

## Solution:

* Simplifies intent-to-action cross chains and 18 billion smart devices globally 
* By simplifying complexity, championing data ownership, and nurturing decentralized intelligence, Up Network helps individuals transform their data into valuable assets while enjoying personalized, context-aware experiences.

## Innovation:

* Web3 simplification via natural language
* Attention abstraction from social and on-chain data
* No-code agent/contract creation and automation 
* Device/Chain/Framework Agnostic 

Agent as a Service with smart devices, introducing the world’s first Web3 AI smart glasses in collaboration with DreamSmart and Google Gemini.

**The Brain:**

* At its core lies the Up Protocol—a powerful framework enabling seamless communication and data exchange between AI agents and smart devices.
* This protocol simplifies complexity, ensuring devices operate in harmony while unlocking new possibilities for interaction and intelligence.
* The Up Chain forms our secure blockchain foundation, delivering security, transparency, and decentralization.
* The Up Protocol leverages this infrastructure to connect smart devices and AI agents seamlessly.

data.title: Give Feedback for Token Metrics AI Chatbot (Ayush)
data.description:
We need to annotate (give feedback) our Token Metrics AI chatbot answers across both Twitter and our production/development environments. This will help us improve the chatbot's performance and gather valuable insights. The CS team should use the provided video tutorial to guide them through the annotation process.

## Objectives

1. Annotate AI chatbot responses on Twitter
2. Annotate AI chatbot responses on the production environment
3. Annotate AI chatbot responses on the development environment

## Steps

1. Review the attached video tutorial on LangSmith annotation

   [Jam | Console logs, network requests, and more](https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e)
2. Access the LangSmith dashboard for Token Metrics using your TM email.
3. Identify and categorize chatbot interactions for annotation
4. Provide feedback and annotations for each interaction
5. Use LangSmith's built-in tools to rate response quality, accuracy, and relevance
6. Document any patterns or issues discovered during the annotation process

## Additional Notes

* Ensure consistency in annotation across all team members
* Focus on both positive and negative examples to provide a balanced dataset
* Pay special attention to edge cases and unique user queries
* Regularly discuss findings with the AI development team to inform improvements

## Success Criteria

* Complete annotation of at least 100 interactions each for Twitter, production, and development environments
* Identify at least 5 areas for improvement in chatbot responses
* Provide a summary report of annotation insights and recommendations

## Resources

* Video tutorial: [https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e](https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e)
* Access credentials for LangSmith dashboard: Use your TM email

Please update this issue with progress and any questions that arise during the annotation process.

data.title: Update SignatureVerifier Contract with Owner and Signer
data.description:
**Description**

This task involves modifying the `SignatureVerifier` contract to include an owner that can update the `signerAddress`. This will add an extra layer of security and flexibility to the contract.

**Tasks**

1. **Implement Contract Ownership**
   * Add an `owner` address variable to the contract.
   * Implement a constructor to set the initial `owner` to the deployer of the contract (`msg.sender`).
   * Implement an `onlyOwner` modifier to restrict certain functions to be called only by the owner.
2. **Implement Function to Change Signer**
   * Add a function `changeSigner(address newSigner)` that allows the owner to update the `signerAddress`.
   * Include `onlyOwner` modifier to restrict access to this function.
3. **Update SPDX License Identifier**
   * Ensure the contract includes an SPDX license identifier.
4. **Code Review and Testing**
   * Write unit tests to verify the new functionality, including:
     * Successful owner assignment.
     * Successful signer change by the owner.
     * Failed signer change by non-owner.
     * Verification of signatures with the new signer.
   * Conduct a code review to ensure the changes are secure and efficient.

data.title: Improvements
data.description:
I have made these improvements:

1. The former code does not work for all of research posts format (various kind of headers for ex: correct HTML header, a "fake" header inside a paragraph tag which makes it difficult to extract the data inside the posts (including text and images). -> I fixed this and now the code will work for every types of research posts.

# System Architecture

This solution consists of three main components working together:

### 1\. WordPress Content Extraction (PHP Webhook)

The `gumloop-webhook.php` plugin serves as the content extraction engine:

* Monitors WordPress for newly published research posts
* Analyzes post structure, identifying headers (H1, H2, H3), paragraph content, and images
* Organizes content hierarchically into sections with proper relationships between text and media
* Detects both standard HTML headers and special header formats (e.g., "Market Analysis", "Token", "Team", etc.)
* Transmits structured content with raw HTML and Gutenberg blocks to the processing API

### 2\. Content Processing & AI Generation (Python)

The Python backend handles the core processing:

* Receives structured content from the WordPress webhook
* Maintains the ordering and relationships between content sections
* Formats the content for optimal AI processing
* Communicates with OpenAI's API to generate Twitter-optimized content
* Extracts and prepares image URLs for attachment to tweets
* Creates a complete, structured Twitter thread package

### 3\. Twitter Publication (Python)

The final component handles social media publishing:

* Takes the generated tweets and associated images
* Authenticates with Twitter's API
* Posts the complete thread with proper formatting
* Ensures images are attached to the appropriate tweets
* Validates successful publication

Here are the documents for everyone to review and give feedbacks. Thanks you guys very much.

[https://docs.google.com/document/d/1VjjKdeGsiPYz_aBMF2z4SCzCMpqy7vxZb5LFuUh1FVQ/edit?tab=t.0](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1VjjKdeGsiPYz_aBMF2z4SCzCMpqy7vxZb5LFuUh1FVQ/edit?tab=t.0)

issues.full_context:
Title: Improvements

Description:
I have made these improvements:

1. The former code does not work for all of research posts format (various kind of headers for ex: correct HTML header, a "fake" header inside a paragraph tag which makes it difficult to extract the data inside the posts (including text and images). -> I fixed this and now the code will work for every types of research posts.

# System Architecture

This solution consists of three main components working together:

### 1\. WordPress Content Extraction (PHP Webhook)

The `gumloop-webhook.php` plugin serves as the content extraction engine:

* Monitors WordPress for newly published research posts
* Analyzes post structure, identifying headers (H1, H2, H3), paragraph content, and images
* Organizes content hierarchically into sections with proper relationships between text and media
* Detects both standard HTML headers and special header formats (e.g., "Market Analysis", "Token", "Team", etc.)
* Transmits structured content with raw HTML and Gutenberg blocks to the processing API

### 2\. Content Processing & AI Generation (Python)

The Python backend handles the core processing:

* Receives structured content from the WordPress webhook
* Maintains the ordering and relationships between content sections
* Formats the content for optimal AI processing
* Communicates with OpenAI's API to generate Twitter-optimized content
* Extracts and prepares image URLs for attachment to tweets
* Creates a complete, structured Twitter thread package

### 3\. Twitter Publication (Python)

The final component handles social media publishing:

* Takes the generated tweets and associated images
* Authenticates with Twitter's API
* Posts the complete thread with proper formatting
* Ensures images are attached to the appropriate tweets
* Validates successful publication

Here are the documents for everyone to review and give feedbacks. Thanks you guys very much.

[https://docs.google.com/document/d/1VjjKdeGsiPYz_aBMF2z4SCzCMpqy7vxZb5LFuUh1FVQ/edit?tab=t.0](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1VjjKdeGsiPYz_aBMF2z4SCzCMpqy7vxZb5LFuUh1FVQ/edit?tab=t.0)

data.title: Finalize the TMAI staking and pricing model with Sam and review on the Data API engine Call
data.description:
Objective: Develop and refine the TMAI staking and pricing model, ensuring it aligns with market conditions, Token Metrics' strategic goals, and user incentives.

Key Actions:

1. **Staking Model Development**
   * Define staking tiers, rewards, and lock-up periods.
   * Assess potential yields, inflation impact, and sustainability.
   * Benchmark against industry standards and competitor models.
2. **Pricing Model Analysis**
   * Determine pricing strategy based on demand, token utility, and market conditions.
   * Ensure fair value exchange for participants while maintaining long-term viability.
   * Consider dynamic pricing mechanisms and potential adjustments based on adoption.
3. **Collaboration with Sam**
   * Review model assumptions and calculations.
   * Align on final parameters and validate the model.
   * Address any outstanding issues before implementation.

Next Steps:

* Finalize and document the model.
* Prepare a presentation or summary for internal review.
* Plan for implementation and communication strategy.

I have completed Newsletter Agent and I believe it's ready to be deployed. 

The agent now included these functions:

Features 

1. ***Responsive design that works across email clients and devices***
2. ***Consistent styling with Token Metrics branding*** 
3. ***Support for market updates, crypto news, and TMAI signals*** 
4. ***Links to Token Metrics platform and research portal "View on X" buttons for TMAI signal tweets***

plus 0.4$-1.2$ (but very low probability that it costs 1.2$) for every images generated inside it. 

So the final cost is: 0.033 + 0.4-1.2$ = 0.433$-1.233$ for a single newsletter.

data.title: Image storing module on Cloudflare
data.description:
The problems I currently have with all the agents I'm working including: X TMAI, X LUCKY, Newsletter is that:

Some of the meme-image is repeated and can be retrieved or used from the history of the generations. But currently, we are not using any kind of database to store it.

=> Problems:

1. Wasting resource
2. Low performance on generating image. A quality image including steps: 1. Image prompts 2. Create images 3. Evaluate them. These steps take 300-400 seconds on average as I have monitored during this week. 

=> Consequence: we can't expand the functionalities of agents like: comment with image, response to anyone with memeable image in quick way. So this will solve it. 

After I complete this module on Cloudflare, I will expand the functionalities of X LUCKY Agent to interact with celebrities and anyone who mentions the account on X and this will make our agent much more "alive"

@ian @talha

comments.body: This one will be pushed to Ahmed as a function for the Image Agent for Ahmed. So this is done @ian @talha

okay I will contact with ahmed to push this code. And regarding the cost, I'm using my free plan and it seems to work okay. We can store \~8000-10000 images a month and the compute aspect of cloudflare is also great. Maybe I will contact with Divine to ask her about the limits to ensure the code is good for production

@phat great, what are the estimated costs for this on Cloudflare?

Also please have @ahmedhamdy @vasilis review the work on Github, thanks

How it works is:

***User prompt*** -> Analyze by AI to turn into an ***image prompt  (2-3 secs) ->*** and then it will search for the words in the image, if cache hits, no need to generate new ones

![image.png](https://uploads.linear.app/3973b0e9-3f84-4e56-bc80-5f55fe46609b/0cfba4d6-b989-4367-b0c5-2daac31d1a79/7157e780-3848-4ef8-9519-75e092793c5c)

these images are stored in R2 bucket (an image storage on Cloudflare)
cc @ian  @talha @ahmedhamdy

This one has been done. Now, all the images in newsletter won't disappear and we have a good module to reply/post images fast. Imagine replying with image to X's users in seconds. Here's the log from my code:

![image.png](https://uploads.linear.app/3973b0e9-3f84-4e56-bc80-5f55fe46609b/c750c33b-3e75-44a1-8c83-7af5522290b2/023e2b82-2bac-4769-9911-c9ce58141959)

data.title: Generate Images from 0xTMAI Posts
data.description:
Connect with @ahmedhamdy and get access to Python code.

Do the following:

* Take 0xTMAI posts and pass into a prompt to generate 4 creative images related to the image
* Use a second LLM (GPT 4o) to evaluate the 4 images and rate the best one that meets the quality threshold (relevancy to content, mascot looks normal, text is accurate with good grammar)
* Selects best image that meets quality threshold to post on X

comments.body: So we agree to use this Agent to fetch data from our own data feed instead @ian. It will not use any of our internal data source like: Snowflake, etc. Maybe we should test for a week and see how we can proceed with it?
I have also completed this and was given an approve to use it by Ian on yesterday's meeting @ian @talha
@ahmedhamdy here's the issue for us to work together

issues.full_context:
Title: Generate Images from 0xTMAI Posts

Description:
Connect with @ahmedhamdy and get access to Python code.

Do the following:

* Take 0xTMAI posts and pass into a prompt to generate 4 creative images related to the image
* Use a second LLM (GPT 4o) to evaluate the 4 images and rate the best one that meets the quality threshold (relevancy to content, mascot looks normal, text is accurate with good grammar)
* Selects best image that meets quality threshold to post on X

data.title: SFX
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Issue Title:** Enhance Token Metrics DAO Long Scripted Video with Sound Effects (SFX)

**Description:** Integrate appropriate sound effects into the long-form scripted video for Token Metrics DAO. This involves selecting, editing, and embedding SFX to complement the video narrative and improve overall production quality.

**Business Rationale:** Adding sound effects will enhance viewer engagement, elevate the professional quality of the video, and effectively convey the intended message, thereby supporting Token Metrics DAO’s branding and communication goals.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

1. All selected sound effects align with the video’s content and tone.
2. Sound effects are seamlessly integrated without causing audio mismatches or distractions.
3. The final video maintains high audio-visual quality and is free from technical issues.
4. The enhanced video receives approval from Olaitan Akintunde and relevant stakeholders.

data.title: Trailer
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Create Long Scripted Trailer Video for Token Metrics DAO

**Assignee:** Olaitan Akintunde

**Description:**
Develop a comprehensive, scripted trailer video for Token Metrics DAO to effectively showcase its mission, features, and benefits.

**Business Rationale:**
A high-quality trailer will enhance Token Metrics DAO’s visibility, attract potential members, and communicate the value proposition clearly, driving engagement and growth within the community.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* Script is written, reviewed, and approved by the marketing team
* Video length is between 5 to 10 minutes
* Clearly highlights key features and benefits of Token Metrics DAO
* Includes professional visuals and high-quality audio
* Delivered in formats suitable for multiple platforms (e.g., YouTube, social media)
* Final video is reviewed and approved by all relevant stakeholders

data.title: Animation
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Develop Long Scripted Animated Video for Token Metrics DAO

**Description:** Create a high-quality, long-form animated video that effectively communicates the mission, features, and benefits of Token Metrics DAO. The video should engage viewers, simplify complex concepts, and highlight the value proposition to attract potential members and stakeholders.

**Business Rationale:** An engaging animated video will enhance Token Metrics DAO’s marketing strategy by providing a visually appealing and easily understandable medium to showcase its offerings. This will help increase awareness, drive user engagement, and support the growth and adoption of the DAO within the community.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

1. **Script Approval:** A comprehensive script reviewed and approved by the Token Metrics DAO team.
2. **Animation Quality:** Professionally animated video that aligns with the brand’s visual guidelines and standards.
3. **Content Coverage:** All key features, benefits, and value propositions of Token Metrics DAO are clearly presented.
4. **Duration:** The final video length meets the agreed-upon time frame (e.g., 5-10 minutes).
5. **Formats Delivered:** Video is provided in multiple formats suitable for web and social media platforms.
6. **Stakeholder Feedback:** Positive feedback from key stakeholders confirming the video meets the intended objectives.

data.description:
Goal: To review the PRD and PRDFAQ documents. Assign the tasks for the campaign to the team

Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Promote Token Metrics AI API - Marketing Campaign Prep Phase 1

**Description:**
Conduct a thorough review of the Product Requirements Document (PRD) and PRDFAQ for the Token Metrics AI API. Assign specific marketing campaign tasks to team members to ensure organized and effective campaign preparation.

**Business Rationale:**
A well-prepared marketing campaign based on comprehensive documentation ensures that the Token Metrics AI API is promoted effectively, targeting the right audience with clear messaging. Assigning tasks enhances team accountability and streamlines the preparation process, leading to a successful campaign launch.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* Reviewed and updated PRD and PRDFAQ documents.
* All marketing campaign tasks identified and assigned to appropriate team members.
* A detailed timeline for the campaign preparation is created and shared with the team.
* Confirmation from team members on their assigned responsibilities.

data.title: Indices Teaser video and voice generation
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Indices Teaser Video and Voice Generation

**Description:**
Develop a high-quality teaser video enhanced with professional voice narration for the Indices project. The video should effectively showcase the key features and value propositions to engage and attract the target audience.

**Business Rationale:**
A compelling teaser video with voiceover will bolster marketing efforts, increase brand visibility, and drive interest in the Indices project. This can lead to higher customer engagement, potential sales growth, and a stronger market presence.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* **Duration:** Video length between 60-90 seconds.
* **Content:** Clearly highlights the main features and benefits of Indices.
* **Quality:** High-definition visuals and professional-grade production.
* **Voiceover:** Clear, engaging narration that aligns with the brand tone.
* **Music:** Appropriate background music that complements the voiceover.
* **Format:** Delivered in formats suitable for major platforms (e.g., MP4, MOV).
* **Approval:** Reviewed and approved by the marketing team and key stakeholders.

A compelling teaser video with voiceover will bolster marketing efforts, increase brand visibility, and drive interest in the Indices project. This can lead to higher customer engagement, potential sales growth, and a stronger market presence.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* **Duration:** Video length between 60-90 seconds.
* **Content:** Clearly highlights the main features and benefits of Indices.
* **Quality:** High-definition visuals and professional-grade production.
* **Voiceover:** Clear, engaging narration that aligns with the brand tone.
* **Music:** Appropriate background music that complements the voiceover.
* **Format:** Delivered in formats suitable for major platforms (e.g., MP4, MOV).
* **Approval:** Reviewed and approved by the marketing team and key stakeholders.

data.title: News Section for Landing
data.description:
Create a slider-style section on the landing page to showcase new products and updates.

Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Add News Slider Section to Landing Page

**Description:**
Develop a slider-style section on the landing page to showcase new products and updates.

**Business Rationale:**
Featuring new products and updates prominently on the landing page will enhance user engagement, inform visitors about the latest offerings, and drive increased interest and sales.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* The slider displays at least five new products or updates.
* Users can navigate the slider using arrows or swipe gestures.
* The section is fully responsive and functions correctly on all major devices and browsers.
* The design aligns with the existing branding and aesthetics of the landing page.
* All functionality is tested and approved based on stakeholder feedback.

comments.body: @agustin OK got it, thank you!

![Captura de pantalla 2025-03-07 a la(s) 10.05.04 a. m..png](https://uploads.linear.app/3973b0e9-3f84-4e56-bc80-5f55fe46609b/a7874c40-79db-4213-a6df-df1aa2072be2/a51abf6b-8f57-44e3-a238-75fc05fcd57d)

@ian For example, here you can see that I’m adjusting the button height based on the text length. The issue with this is that it creates visual inconsistency when switching slides, making the button appear in a different position each time for the user.

![Captura de pantalla 2025-03-07 a la(s) 10.02.20 a. m..png](https://uploads.linear.app/3973b0e9-3f84-4e56-bc80-5f55fe46609b/4c5758de-3d15-48ec-8a42-e0a58c30ce4c/787a53a7-fb4a-426b-8213-420d18e47c67)

@ian For this case, I would recommend leaving this space between the descriptive text and the buttons. This gives us flexibility when creating new slides with updated news, as we’ll have room for slightly longer text. Additionally, it ensures that the buttons always stay at the same height, maintaining visual consistency.
@ian

What do you think? @talha 

![Captura de pantalla 2025-03-05 a la(s) 4.09.19 p. m..png](https://uploads.linear.app/3973b0e9-3f84-4e56-bc80-5f55fe46609b/45012079-0700-40b2-9358-8971d0fd26aa/14149464-1ec8-4c91-b3f2-6bba1acf1f2a)

Here you can try the prototype and use the slider: [https://www.figma.com/proto/zxr2UjSXkUc9zyhyxHkL1V/Landing-Page-Token-Metrics?page-id=0%3A1&node-id=194-358&viewport=-367%2C388%2C0.19&t=Jy3Mc5qSReKKy70n-1&scaling=min-zoom&content-scaling=fixed](https://www.figma.com/proto/zxr2UjSXkUc9zyhyxHkL1V/Landing-Page-Token-Metrics?page-id=0%3A1&node-id=194-358&viewport=-367%2C388%2C0.19&t=Jy3Mc5qSReKKy70n-1&scaling=min-zoom&content-scaling=fixed)

data.title: Product Demo for Trading in Token Metrics
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Develop Product Demo for Trading Features in Token Metrics

**Description:**
Create a comprehensive demonstration highlighting the trading functionalities of the Token Metrics platform. The demo should showcase key features such as real-time analytics, trade execution, portfolio management, and risk assessment tools to effectively illustrate the platform's capabilities to potential users and stakeholders.

**Business Rationale:**
A well-designed product demo is crucial for marketing and sales efforts, enabling prospective clients to understand and engage with Token Metrics' trading features. This will help increase user acquisition, enhance user engagement, and drive revenue growth by clearly communicating the value and advantages of our trading tools.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* The demo includes interactive demonstrations of real-time analytics, trade execution, portfolio management, and risk assessment.
* It is user-friendly and accessible via the company website and other relevant channels.
* The demo effectively communicates the unique selling points of Token Metrics' trading features.
* Supporting documentation and guides are provided to assist users in navigating the demo.
* Positive feedback is received from at least three key stakeholders confirming the demo's effectiveness in showcasing the trading functionalities.

data.title: Small affiliate reach out and list
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Expand Affiliate Outreach for V1 TMAI Referral Program

**Description:**
Identify and engage small affiliates to join the V1 TMAI Referral Program. Compile a targeted list of potential affiliates and initiate outreach efforts to encourage their participation.

**Business Rationale:**
Increasing the number of small affiliates will broaden the program’s reach, drive more referrals, and enhance overall revenue through diverse partner networks.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* A list of at least 50 potential small affiliates is compiled.
* Outreach communications are sent to all identified affiliates.
* A minimum of 10 affiliates respond with interest in the referral program.
* At least 5 new affiliates are successfully onboarded into the V1 TMAI Referral Program.

data.title: Edit Product Video
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Edit Product Video

**Description:** Revise the existing product video to enhance visual quality and effectively highlight key features. This includes trimming unnecessary sections, updating content to reflect the latest product information, adding high-resolution graphics, ensuring consistent branding, and optimizing the video for various platforms.

**Business Rationale:** A high-quality, engaging product video will better showcase our product's strengths, improve customer understanding, and boost marketing efforts. This can lead to increased customer engagement, higher conversion rates, and strengthened brand presence in the market.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

1. Video length is reduced to under 2 minutes without losing essential information.

data.title: Meetings
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Optimize Meeting Scheduling Process

**Description:**  
Enhance the current meeting scheduling system to minimize conflicts and improve efficiency. This includes implementing automated scheduling tools, setting clear guidelines for meeting durations, and establishing optimal times for meetings.

**Business Rationale:**  
Efficient meeting management increases productivity by reducing time conflicts and ensuring meetings are purposeful and time-bound. This optimization allows team members to focus more on their core tasks, leading to better overall business performance.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* An automated scheduling tool is integrated with the company calendar.
* Clear guidelines for meeting durations and optimal scheduling times are documented and distributed.
* All team members are trained on the new scheduling process.
* Meeting conflicts are reduced by at least 50% within two months of implementation.

data.title: Publish a Daily Crypto Podcast
data.description:
Create and publish a daily crypto newsletter that provides full-scope view of the daily movement of the crypto market while positioning token metrics as a premier brand for crypto information and analysis.

Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Publish Daily Crypto Podcast

**Description:**

**Description:**
Create and release a daily crypto podcast that delivers a comprehensive overview of the day's cryptocurrency market movements. The podcast will establish Token Metrics as a leading authority in crypto information and analysis.

**Business Rationale:**
Launching a daily crypto podcast will engage a broader audience, enhance brand visibility, and provide valuable insights to crypto enthusiasts. This initiative aims to increase Token Metrics' market presence, attract more users, and reinforce its position as a premier source for crypto analysis.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

1. Develop a podcast format and content plan covering key daily crypto market updates.
2. Record, edit, and publish a high-quality podcast episode every weekday.
3. Distribute the podcast on major platforms (e.g., Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Google Podcasts).
4. Achieve at least 500 subscribers within the first three months.
5. Receive an average listener rating of 4 stars or higher.

data.title: Friday Edition
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Create "Friday Edition" Weekly Newsletter

**Description:** Develop and launch the "Friday Edition" weekly newsletter, managed by Caleb Nnamani. This newsletter will deliver curated content, company updates, and industry insights every Friday to engage and inform our subscribers.

**Business Rationale:** A consistent weekly newsletter will enhance audience engagement, strengthen brand loyalty, and drive traffic to our platform. By providing valuable content on a regular basis, we aim to retain existing subscribers and attract new ones, ultimately supporting our growth objectives.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

1. **Design:** The newsletter adheres to the company's branding guidelines, including logo, color scheme, and layout.
2. **Content:** Curated content is reviewed and approved by Caleb Nnamani, featuring sections such as latest updates, featured articles, and upcoming events.
3. **Distribution:** Automated delivery is set up to send the newsletter every Friday to the entire subscriber list without errors.
4. **Compatibility:** The newsletter is tested and displays correctly across major email clients and devices.
5. **Analytics:** Tracking is implemented to monitor open rates, click-through rates, and other key engagement metrics.
6. **Subscription Goal:** Achieve at least 300 new subscribers within the first month of launch.

data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Create Daily Newsletter - Caleb Nnamani

**Description:**
Develop and launch a daily newsletter to provide subscribers with the latest updates, news, and insights related to our business. The newsletter should be visually appealing, mobile-friendly, and align with our brand messaging.

**Business Rationale:**
A daily newsletter will enhance customer engagement, increase brand visibility, and drive traffic to our website. It serves as a direct communication channel to keep our audience informed, foster loyalty, and support our marketing efforts.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

1. **Design:** Newsletter template adheres to brand guidelines and is responsive on all devices.

3. **Automation:** Email distribution system is set up to send the newsletter automatically each day.
4. **Subscription Management:** Users can easily subscribe and unsubscribe, with the process functioning correctly.
5. **Analytics:** Tracking is implemented to monitor open rates, click-through rates, and other key metrics.
6. **Launch:** The first edition is successfully sent out on the scheduled launch date without issues.

data.title: SMM Content planning and posting
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Issue: SMM Content Planning and Posting**

**Description:**
Develop and execute a structured social media marketing (SMM) content strategy, including the planning, scheduling, and posting of content across selected platforms to enhance brand visibility and audience engagement.

**Business Rationale:**
A well-organized SMM content plan ensures consistent and relevant communication with our target audience, driving brand awareness, fostering customer relationships, and supporting overall marketing objectives. Effective content posting schedules optimize reach and engagement, contributing to increased traffic and potential revenue growth.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

1. A comprehensive content calendar is created for the next three months, outlining topics, formats, and posting dates for each social media platform.
2. All content is reviewed and approved by the marketing team at least two days before the scheduled posting date.
3. Posts are published according to the content calendar without delays or omissions.
4. Engagement metrics (likes, shares, comments) meet or exceed predefined targets for each platform.
5. Monthly reports are generated to assess content performance and inform future planning.

data.title: Blogs and Designs Postings
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Blogs and Design Postings to Achieve 1M Monthly Traffic

**Description:**  
Develop and publish regular blog articles and design content authored by Roshan Ganesh with the goal of increasing website traffic to 1 million monthly visitors.

**Business Rationale:**  
Achieving 1M monthly traffic will enhance brand visibility, attract potential customers, and drive revenue growth. High-quality content will establish the company as an industry leader and engage the target audience effectively.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* Create a content calendar outlining blog and design postings for the next six months.
* Publish a minimum of four blog posts and two design pieces each month.
* Ensure all content adheres to SEO best practices to optimize search engine visibility.
* Monitor website analytics to demonstrate a steady increase in traffic, reaching 1M monthly visitors within the designated timeframe.
* Achieve predefined engagement metrics, such as average time on page and social media shares.
* Receive approval from stakeholders on content quality and strategy effectiveness.

data.title: Memes and GIFs for SM
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Create Memes and GIFs for Social Media to Boost Traffic

**Description:** Develop a series of branded memes and GIFs tailored for our social media platforms to enhance engagement and drive traffic to our website, supporting the goal of achieving 1M monthly visitors.

**Business Rationale:** Leveraging popular and shareable visual content like memes and GIFs can increase user interaction, expand our reach, and attract more visitors to our site, contributing directly to our monthly traffic target.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

1. Produce at least 20 unique memes and 10 GIFs aligned with our brand voice.
2. Ensure all content is optimized for major social platforms (e.g., Instagram, Twitter, Facebook).
3. Achieve a minimum engagement rate of 5% on each post within the first month.
4. Demonstrate an increase in website traffic by contributing at least 50,000 visitors monthly from social media channels.

**Title:** Video/Clip Generation with Icon

**Assignee:** Roshan Ganesh

**Description:**  
Develop a video generation feature that includes customizable icons to enhance the visual appeal and user experience of our platform.

**Business Rationale:**  
Introducing customizable icons in video generation will differentiate our service, attract more users, and support our goal of achieving 1 million monthly traffic by increasing user engagement and satisfaction.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* Users can add, select, and customize icons within the video generation tool.
* Icons can be resized, colored, and positioned as desired.
* The feature is fully responsive and functions seamlessly across all supported devices and browsers.
* Performance remains optimal, with video generation times within acceptable limits.
* Comprehensive testing is completed with no critical bugs reported.
* User feedback mechanisms are in place to monitor feature adoption and satisfaction.

**Title:** Achieve 1M Monthly Traffic

**Description:**  
Increase the website’s monthly unique visitors to 1 million by the end of Q4 2024 to enhance brand visibility and drive business growth.

Reaching 1M monthly visitors will significantly boost brand awareness, expand our potential customer base, and increase opportunities for revenue generation, aligning with our strategic growth objectives.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* Achieve an average of 1,000,000 unique visitors per month by December 31, 2024.
* Ensure traffic growth is sustained over three consecutive months.
* Diversify traffic sources, with at least 40% from organic search, 30% from direct visits, and 30% from referrals/social media.
* Maintain or improve the current bounce rate and average session duration metrics.

**Description:**
Create a comprehensive scripted video for Token Metrics DAO that details its features, benefits, and future roadmap to effectively engage and inform stakeholders and potential users.

A well-produced video will enhance Token Metrics DAO's visibility, facilitate better understanding of its value proposition, and attract investors and community members by clearly communicating its objectives and advantages.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* Approved script reviewed by the content and marketing teams.
* Video duration between 10 to 15 minutes.
* Includes sections on introduction, key features, benefits, roadmap, and a call to action.
* High-quality visuals and clear audio narration.
* Delivered in HD format suitable for multiple platforms.
* Final approval obtained from Olaitan Akintunde.

Create a comprehensive scripted video for Token Metrics DAO that details its features, benefits, and future roadmap to effectively engage and inform stakeholders and potential users.

**Business Rationale:**
A well-produced video will enhance Token Metrics DAO's visibility, facilitate better understanding of its value proposition, and attract investors and community members by clearly communicating its objectives and advantages.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* Approved script reviewed by the content and marketing teams.
* Video duration between 10 to 15 minutes.
* Includes sections on introduction, key features, benefits, roadmap, and a call to action.
* High-quality visuals and clear audio narration.
* Delivered in HD format suitable for multiple platforms.
* Final approval obtained from Olaitan Akintunde.

---

data.title: Peer Reviews on Phat and Olaitans Work
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Implement Peer Review Process for Phat and Olaitan’s Work

**Description:**  
Establish a structured peer review process for all work submitted by Phat and Olaitan. This process will ensure code quality, foster knowledge sharing, and maintain adherence to project standards.

**Business Rationale:**  
Implementing a peer review process enhances the overall quality of work, promotes team collaboration, and minimizes defects. This leads to more reliable product releases, increased team efficiency, and continuous improvement in development practices.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* A documented peer review workflow is created and accessible to the team.
* Designated reviewers are assigned for Phat and Olaitan’s submissions.
* All submissions by Phat and Olaitan undergo peer review before being merged.
* Feedback from reviews is tracked and addressed within a defined timeframe.
* The peer review process is communicated to the entire team and integrated into the project management tool.

data.description:
Code Reviews 2 done

Deep Dive done

Hidden Gems done

Webinar

Groomed Issue:

**Issue Title:** Enhance Team Collaboration and Knowledge Sharing Initiatives

**Description:**
Implement a comprehensive strategy to improve team collaboration and knowledge sharing by expanding Research Content, conducting Code Reviews, organizing Deep Dive sessions, uncovering Hidden Gems, hosting Webinars, and optimizing Emails communication. Assign Talha Ahmad to lead and coordinate these initiatives to ensure seamless execution and engagement across the team.

**Business Rationale:**
Enhancing collaboration and knowledge sharing fosters a more informed and cohesive team, leading to increased productivity, higher code quality, and innovation. By systematically addressing these areas, the organization can leverage collective expertise, reduce knowledge silos, and maintain a competitive edge in the industry.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

1. **Research Content:** Develop and publish at least four comprehensive research articles or resources per quarter.
2. **Code Reviews:** Establish a bi-weekly code review process with documented feedback and improvement tracking.
3. **Deep Dive Sessions:** Conduct monthly Deep Dive sessions on relevant topics, with participation from at least 80% of the team.
4. **Hidden Gems:** Identify and share at least five lesser-known tools or practices quarterly that can enhance team efficiency.
5. **Webinars:** Organize and execute quarterly webinars featuring internal or external experts, achieving a minimum attendance rate of 75% of the team.
6. **Emails:** Streamline email communications by implementing best practices and templates, reducing response times by 20%.
7. **Leadership:** Talha Ahmad effectively coordinates all initiatives, with monthly progress reports submitted to management and positive feedback from team members.

data.title: Improve Token Details Page Responsiveness
data.description:
[Jam | Console logs, network requests, and more](https://jam.dev/c/f555d124-59f9-4272-85fd-189fa3443a8d)

**Objective:**
Redesign the **Token Details Page** to ensure a seamless experience across all screen sizes, particularly **small desktop and mobile screens**.

**Current Issues:**

* The UI is only optimized for **large desktop screens**; it breaks on **smaller screens**.
* **Elements are misplaced** on small desktops and mobile devices.
* **Mobile responsiveness does not always trigger** on certain screen sizes.
* Some sections (**Exchange popup, Trading Signals PnL, and Charts**) do not scale properly, requiring manual zooming.

**Design Requirements:**

1. **Responsive Layout:** Ensure the page adjusts smoothly across **small desktop, tablet, and mobile** screen sizes.
2. **Adaptive UI Elements:**
   * Proper alignment of all components (e.g., exchange popup, charts, tables).
   * Ensure text, buttons, and icons scale appropriately.
3. **Consistent Mobile Behavior:**
   * Mobile responsiveness should trigger automatically on all mobile resolutions.
   * Improve spacing and padding to enhance readability.
4. **Usability Enhancements:**
   * Prevent horizontal scrolling and unnecessary zooming.
   * Ensure popups and interactive elements remain functional on touchscreens.
5. **Test on Multiple Devices:**
   * Large and small desktop screens
   * Tablets
   * Various mobile devices (iOS & Android)

**Deliverables:**

* **Updated Figma designs** showing the improved responsive layout.
* **Prototype/demo** for review.
* **Redline specs** for developers.

data.title: Give Feedback for Token Metrics AI Agent (Val)
data.description:
We need to annotate (give feedback) our Token Metrics AI chatbot answers across both Twitter and our production/development environments. This will help us improve the chatbot's performance and gather valuable insights. The CS team should use the provided video tutorial to guide them through the annotation process.

## Objectives

1. Annotate AI chatbot responses on Twitter.
2. Annotate AI chatbot responses in the production environment.
3. Annotate AI chatbot responses in the development environment.

## Steps

1. Review the attached video tutorial on LangSmith annotation

   [Jam | Console logs, network requests, and more](https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e)
2. Access the LangSmith dashboard for Token Metrics using your TM email.
3. Identify and categorize chatbot interactions for annotation
4. Provide feedback and annotations for each interaction
5. Use LangSmith's built-in tools to rate response quality, accuracy, and relevance
6. Document any patterns or issues discovered during the annotation process

## Additional Notes

* Ensure consistency in annotation across all team members
* Focus on both positive and negative examples to provide a balanced dataset
* Pay special attention to edge cases and unique user queries
* Regularly discuss findings with the AI development team to inform improvements

## Success Criteria

* Complete annotation of at least 100 interactions each for Twitter, production, and development environments
* Identify at least 5 areas for improvement in chatbot responses
* Provide a summary report of annotation insights and recommendations

## Resources

* Video tutorial: [https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e](https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e)
* Access credentials for LangSmith dashboard: Use your TM email

Please update this issue with progress and any questions that arise during the annotation process.

3. Annotate AI chatbot responses on the development environment

## Steps

1. Review the attached video tutorial on LangSmith annotation

   [Jam | Console logs, network requests, and more](https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e)
2. Access the LangSmith dashboard for Token Metrics using your TM email.
3. Identify and categorize chatbot interactions for annotation
4. Provide feedback and annotations for each interaction
5. Use LangSmith's built-in tools to rate response quality, accuracy, and relevance
6. Document any patterns or issues discovered during the annotation process

## Additional Notes

* Ensure consistency in annotation across all team members
* Focus on both positive and negative examples to provide a balanced dataset
* Pay special attention to edge cases and unique user queries
* Regularly discuss findings with the AI development team to inform improvements

## Success Criteria

* Complete annotation of at least 100 interactions each for Twitter, production, and development environments
* Identify at least 5 areas for improvement in chatbot responses
* Provide a summary report of annotation insights and recommendations

## Resources

* Video tutorial: [https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e](https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e)
* Access credentials for LangSmith dashboard: Use your TM email

Please update this issue with progress and any questions that arise during the annotation process.

data.title: Update the Market Page UI
data.description:
## Improving Scroll Visibility

On the other hand, in the same section where these highlights are displayed, we can swipe to see

more

The issue I found is that it's not very intuitive that users can scroll to the right. Although there is an

arrow indicating this, it is barely visible, which could result in users not realizing there are more

options beyond the first three displayed.

Some possible solutions for this are&

% Making the arrow a lighter color that contrasts better with the background (white or yellow could

work)(

% Adding a subtle gradient that darkens the right-side container, giving a visual hint that horizontal

scrolling is possible(

% Partially revealing the next slide, allowing it to peek through slightly to create a sense of

continuity(

% Adding a scroll bar at the bottom to indicate that horizontal scrolling is available. Alternatively,

this could be replaced with dots that show the user's position within the slide, similar to

Instagram carousels.

We can also add a title to help users understand what the upcoming highlights are about.

![Screenshot 2025-03-01 at 03.30.21.png](https://uploads.linear.app/3973b0e9-3f84-4e56-bc80-5f55fe46609b/8d3b5c2a-3e89-450f-aa71-3657e792709b/ed8fc2bf-4fb5-4bb1-bbd4-e8ff199ca6a1)

comments.body: [Market page scroll fix - TMAI_task (Figma)](https://www.figma.com/design/74Zz1grTtdFlkydLSZe3q7/TMAI_task?node-id=9952-11007&t=lzbUnKGzyF0GtnWp-4)

data.title: Difficulty Claiming Airdrop (3 Issues)
data.description:
1. Users aren’t receiving airdrops despite linking their wallets. Some see their wallets connected but get no tokens, while others are unsure if the connection worked. This suggests a lack of clear confirmation and verification after submission. Fixes may involve improving the submission and tracking process so eligible users reliably receive their airdrops.

[https://insights.reforge.com/w/clzajz1q900psoxafl5skkrcl/feedback/structured/clzh9x6ej02j056ljbelgu879/theme/cm67lh6k50hlo1omi2dqeapho?from=2025-02-21](https://insights.reforge.com/w/clzajz1q900psoxafl5skkrcl/feedback/structured/clzh9x6ej02j056ljbelgu879/theme/cm67lh6k50hlo1omi2dqeapho?from=2025-02-21)va

comments.body:
Jo-Ann Keith - This user asked about being hacked, which we sympathized with her  and also asked about how she can stake on our platform which we shared her updates.

> [onecoinscurrency@gmail.com](mailto:onecoinscurrency@gmail.com)

We also shared TMAI CA for her to be able to add it to her Metamask.

[aspchh@aol.com](mailto:aspchh@aol.com) - This user had issues with staking TMAI, which we escalated to the internal team with a reference ticket - [ENG-4955](https://linear.app/token-metrics/issue/ENG-4955/tmai-staking-issue)

0x68ce7cc0f2a2d9fd35f2dff815e7ae1ca3e9d310@nftuser.com - had an issue with staking so I reached out to him to know if he is still currently experiencing this issue. 

Good so far, I  will escalate further if the user is experiencing any issues.

data.title: Customer Interview-Active Users that signed up last 30 days.
data.description:
The aim of this task is to organize and conduct interviews with active users who signed up within the last 30 days. The goal is to gather insights on their experience, pain points, and suggestions for improvement in our platform. These insights will help refine our product features and enhance user satisfaction. A segment of active users with over 10 web sessions in the last 30 days should be targeted.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

1. A segment of active users who signed up in the last 30 days and have had more than 10 web sessions is created and verified.
2. Interview invitations are sent to the selected users via email, offering an incentive (e.g., a free month of Token Metrics).
3. At least 5 customer interviews are scheduled, conducted, and recorded.
4. Key insights from the interviews are documented and shared with the product team.
5. Follow-up actions or next steps are defined based on user feedback.
